, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>My wife\u2019s No 1 place of worship is Muthappan\n( old form of Shiva ). &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-x7P4hVmo1Hc/WOZQTMGQ0fI/AAAAAAABSJY/3H86JYD_FgM0n3fPXIv7Coxhc_JdaFg3gCLcB/s1600/theywwsyam_photo_story_by_shyjith_kannur_17.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>She and my mother are from Kannur the fountainhead of Koodiyattam , the older form of Kathakali.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ZUrZwKPNBAM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZUrZwKPNBAM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SHAKTI ( Sankhya form of Shiva\u2019s wife ) is worshipped in Muthappan temples.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Rty3uw8IzVc/WOZNBUPmZdI/AAAAAAABSI8/sllxdWCNdTo41PvySzzqxeRDqYLgMYLpwCLcB/s1600/8055d189e68ba728bbrdaa604a6ee67d7.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There are 108 major forms of Theyyam dance ( for snake groves ) and more than\n500 minor forms <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Kottiyoor temple , the oldest temple on the\nplanet -- conducted Koodiyattam in ancient days .&nbsp; Here the water flows in a mobius coil pattern\ngenerating a tremendous scalar field . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nancient days when Saraswati river lived (&nbsp;\nbefore 4000 BC ) Varanasi ghats had this modius water flow with\nSaraswati river emerging from under the ground to join Ganga at the ghats . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/gGgQBdequvU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/gGgQBdequvU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;In\nthose ancient days people from Kerala used to go to Kashi ( Benares / Varanasi) when they know they will die soon. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nsons take the father there , do the anthim samskara ( last rites) and then come\nback<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_72M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03515649322352795115\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 6, 2017 at 9:12 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain,<br />\n<br />\nIn all the Theyyam and Bhuta Kola videos,<br />\n<br />\nThe musicians are playing these fast Tabla/Drum beats.<br />\n<br />\nEven sometimes there are other instruments - wind instruments.<br />\n<br />\nBut, here's the fun part.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThere is no Director standing infront of them waving his hands in funny manner to make them aware what to play and what not to play.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThen, how are they able to collectively play such complex beats with such skill without any central figure ?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_72BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 6, 2017 at 9:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_78MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain,<br />\n<br />\nIs the Theyyam performer - possesed by the spirit of the God they are enacting ?<br />\n<br />\nThis is the case in Bhuta Kola.<br />\n<br />\nBut in some Theyyam videos, the performer behaves normally at one moment and then switches over to his more possessed form. Reverse also happens.<br />\n<br />\nBoth of this happens frequently.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_78BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedSDE5D\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_77T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedSDE5D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_77TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_77TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_77TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedSDE5D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_77TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_77TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedSDE5D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_77TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_77TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_77TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedSDE5D\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_77B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7949032495447363902\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_77M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-part-3.html?showComment=1491494874944#c7949032495447363902\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 6, 2017 at 9:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_77MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHEYYAM PERFORMERS ARE IN A TRANCE<br />\n<br />\nTHEY QUOTE YOUR PAST--LOUDLY<br />\n<br />\nMANY FEMALES ARE AFRAID TO GO.. THEY HAVE SECRETS</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedSDE5D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_78b+seedSDE5D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the Rasa\ntheory of the Natya Shastra, entertainment is a desired effect of performance\narts but not the primary goal, and that the primary goal is to transport the\nindividual in the audience into another parallel reality, full of wonder and\nbliss, where he experiences the essence of his own consciousness, and reflects\non spiritual and moral questions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Performance arts,\nstates Natyashastra, are a form of Vedic ritual ceremony (yajna). The\n\"rasa theory\" of Natyashastra, presumes that bliss is intrinsic and\ninnate in man, it exists in oneself, that manifests non-materially through\nspiritual and personally subjective means. Performance arts aim to empower man\nto experience this rasa, or re-experience it. Actors aim to journey the\nspectator to this aesthetic experience within him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the literary\nfocalisations are named as first person narration, second person narration and\nthird person narration, the visual narration names it as external focalisation,\ninternal focalisation and Zero focalisation. The external focalisation is the\nview point of a person outside the play. The soothrdhara of ancient Sanskrit\nplays can be categorized under external focalisation..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The internal\nfocalisation is the perspective of a character. The character guides the story\nthrough his feelings and thoughts. It can be a soliloquy or an unspoken\nnarration through his past. Zero focalisation gives a perspective of an\nomniscient narrator.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Natya connects\nthrough abhinaya, that is applying body-speech-mind and scene, wherein asserts\nNatyashastra, the actors use two practices of dharmi (performance), in four\nstyles and four regional variations, accompanied by song and music in a\nplayhouse carefully designed to achieve siddhi (success in production).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Natyashastra states\nthat the playwright should know the bhavas (inner state of being) of all\ncharacters in the story, and it is these bhavas that the audience of that drama\nconnects with. The hero is shown to be similar to everyone in some ways, trying\nto achieve the four goals of human life in Hindu philosophy, then the vastu\n(plot) emerges through the \"representation of three worlds \u2013 the divine,\nthe human, the demonic\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drama has dharma, it has artha, it has kama,\nit has humor, fighting and killing. The best drama shows the good and the bad,\nactions and feelings, of each character, whether god or mandrama is that art\nwhich accepts human beings are in different inner states when they arrive as\naudience, then through the art performed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It provides enjoyment to those\nwanting pleasure, solace to those in grief, calmness to those who are worried,\nenergy to those who are brave, courage to those who are cowards, eroticism to\nthose who want company, enjoyment to those who are rich, knowledge to those who\nare uneducated, wisdom to those who are educated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drama represents the truths\nabout life and worlds, through emotions and circumstances, to deliver\nentertainment, but more importantly ethos, questions, peace and happiness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The text discusses the\ndominant, transitory and temperamental states, for dramatic arts, and the means\nthat an artist can use to express these states</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Natyasastra describes the\nstage for performance arts as the sacred space for artists, and discusses the\nspecifics of stage design, positioning the actors, the relative locations,\nmovement on stage, entrance and exit, change in background, transition, objects\ndisplayed on the stage, and such architectural features of a theatre; the text\nasserts that these aspects help the audience get absorbed in the drama as well\nas understand the message and the meaning being communicated<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian art evolved with\nan emphasis on inducing special spiritual or philosophical states in the\naudience, or with representing them symbolically.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eyes and the gestures\nwith eyes are a very important part of Kathakali. Within the series of eye\nmovements, eight kinds of movements are important: after each exercise, the eye\nfocuses on one point, cutting itself off the environment. Over time, the calm\ninterval gradually turns into a means of meditation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When chenda leaves\nareas of pause in percussion, the the slack is picked up by maddalam, which\nalso synchronises the pitch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kathakali performers\nwith their heavy, stylized makeup, complemented by elaborate costumes and\nopulent head dresses, make a striking psychological impression on the\nviewer.&nbsp; Therein lies the magic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each character\u2019s every emotion\nis expressed on the face with an intense, stylized vividness, in harmony with\nthe rhythm of the dance and melody of the music. The actors not only express\nthe subjective emotions of the human heart, but give objective impersonations\nof the characters, scenes, creatures and surroundings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6145414133670793645\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_871M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/10911785535385959342\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Ganesh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html?showComment=1491540709228#c6145414133670793645\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 7, 2017 at 10:21 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_871MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHello Capt.<br />\n<br />\nGlad that you have decided to talk about Rothschild created Gurus and Gods to clear my doubts. Now coming to Ramanujas and his philosophy.<br />\n<br />\nYOU HAVE MENTIONED RAMANUJA WEDGED VAISHNAVAS OUT OF HINDUISM ? PLS THROW MORE LIGHT ON THIS TOPIC.<br />\n<br />\nNOW COMING TO WHAT VAISHNAVAS ARE TALKING ABOUT ADVAITA VEDANTA -&gt;<br />\n<br />\nI am giving source reference and content. Pls answer<br />\n<br />\nCheck link below and be surprised.<br />\n<br />\n1. http://www.srivaishnavam.com/faq.html#7<br />\n<br />\n7.It is said that Vishishtadvaita is also an advaita. What is the difference between Vishishtadvaita and Advaita?<br />\n<br />\nAdvaita and Vishishtadvaita have no connection at all. Advaita is implicit atheism. Advaita is called as \u201cPrachanna Bowdhdam\u201d. Advaita is based only on a personal interpretation of Abheda-sruthi. In Advaita, Brahman is the only knowledge-self reality and is without any attributes. The three types of differences namely difference in individuality, difference in types and differences in its integral parts are not in Brahman. Nothing other than this Brahman is reality. Though the Brahman is eternally free and only knowledge self, it gets obstructed/covered by ignorance and without realizing itself as Brahman (as told above) becomes to realize itself wrongly as Jeevaatman and gets bound in the material universe which is not a reality.<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_871BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; padding: 0px;\" unselectable=\"on\"><div style=\"zoom: 1;\" unselectable=\"on\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_871b+seedNnD\" kind=\"d\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_872B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_871b+seedNnD\" kind=\"d\"><img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_871b+seedNnD\" kind=\"d\">\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1933795266148053238\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_872M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html?showComment=1491541411862#c1933795266148053238\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 7, 2017 at 10:33 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_872MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nLISTEN<br />\n<br />\nI DONT HAVE THE TIME TO ARGUE OVER SHIT<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />THIS BLOG BELOW DESCRIBES DVAITA VEDANTA&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</span><br />\n<br />\nNOW THAT YOU KNOW WHAT DVAITA VEDANTA IS<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">READ THE BULLSHIT OF FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD MADHAVACHARYA , WHO ROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS SAY IS THE CREATOR OF DVAITA VEDANTA</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madhvacharya<br /><br />https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dvaita</span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT NONSENSE IS THIS ? -- IT IS MADNESS !!<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID I START THIS BLOGSITE ? TO DELETE ALL MADNESS AND POISON INJECTED INTO OUR VEDAS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</span></li>\n<span id=\"bc_0_871b+seedNnD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_871b+seedNnD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_871b+seedNnD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_871b+seedNnD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2967184749440855234\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_34M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_28.html?showComment=1535501013063#c2967184749440855234\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 29, 2018 at 5:33 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIT IS NOW TIME TO MAKE ONE OF THE GREATEST REVELATION BY A COMMENT.. THERE ARE MORE THAN TWO LAKH COMMENTS IN MY BLOGSITE..<br /><br />MANY READERS COME HERE JUST TO READ THE TAAZA COMMENTS -- NOT MY BLOGS ( WHICH THEY SAY ARE TOO LONG )..<br /><br />HERE WE GO..<br /><br />THE WHOLE OF YESTERDAY TWO BENAMI MEDIA COMMIE TV CHANNELS WERE BITCHING ABOUT BAAAD HINDUS ZEALOTS KILLING ATHEIST RATIONALISTS DHABOLKAR , KALBURGI, PANSARE , GAURI LANKESH ETC.<br /><br />THESE PATHETIC COMMIES HAD A SINGLE MISSION-- DENIGRATE HINDUS AND SANATANA DHARMA.<br /><br />THEY GOT FOREIGN MONEY AND FAME FOR BRANDING SANATANA DHARMA AS A RELIGION OF EXTREME SUPERSTITION AND PAINTING HINDUS AS SAVAGES..<br /><br />ONE WRITER UC ANANTHAMURTHY PISSED ON A VISHNU IDOL BEING WORSHIPED TO PROVE THAT THE IDOL HAS NO POWERS AND CANNOT HIT BACK.. HE WENT AROUND BOASTING.. OUR COLEGIUM JUDICIARY CRIED \u201c FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION\u201d.<br /><br />BUT WITHIN A WEEK UC ANANTHAMURTHY HAD KIDNEY PROBLEMS AND TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF EXPENSIVE DIALYSIS THE ITALIAN WAITRESS MADE HIM VC OF AN UNIVERSITY..<br /><br />OF COURSE UC ANATHAMURTHY WOULD NEVER PISS ON A STATUE OF JESUS / MARY OR THE HOLY KORAN TO BRAND THEM POWERLESS TO STRIKE BACK..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ATHEIST RATIONALISTS MUST KNOW THAT SANATANA DHARMA HAS ZERO SUPERSTITION..</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_34MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><br /></b></span>THE DAY MODERN SCIENCE CAN TIDE UP AND BREACH THE LAST FRONTIER TO MEET SANATANA DHARMA AND SEE EYE TO EYE , THERE WILL BE PRALAYA ( COSMIC DISSOLUTION ) DUE TO STAGNATION..<br /><br />FOR EXAMPLE -- ALBERT EINSTEIN STOLE ALL HIS AWARD WINNING THEORIES FROM VEDANTA..<br /><br />EINSTEIN JUST PUT SOME MATH AND MADE SUBJECTIVE ANCIENT VEDANTA LOOK LIKE OBJECTIVE MODERN SCIENCE.. THE BEST PART IS THAT HE OUTSOURCED HIS MATH TO INDIA AND HE WAS POOR IN MATH..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html</span><br /><br />VISHNU IS A COSMIC ALLEGORY ..AN ENERGY FIELD --JUST LIKE BRAHMA AND SHIVA ON A MACRO AND MICRO SCALE..<br /><br />A BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS THE FIRST TO REVEAL THIS.. THAT IS WHY HE IS THE NO 1 WRITER ON THE PLANET WITH PROFILE VIEW OF 739 MILLION...<br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</span><br /><br />THE WIVES OF THE TRINITY ARE ALSO COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br /><br />FOR EXAMPLE THE WHITE MAN AND COMMIES WHO ARE INVITED FOR DROHI LITERARY FESTS RIDICULED THAT BRAHMA DID INCEST WITH HIS OWN DAUGHTER SARASWATI..<br /><br />IF YOU GOOGLE \u201c&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BRAHMA INCEST</span></b>&nbsp;\u201c YOU WILL GET 4.8 LAKH POSTS ..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">SARASWATI ( WIFE OF BRAHMA ) IS THE MIGHTY QUASAR WHICH IS SEVERAL TRILLION TIMES MORE BRILLIANT THAN THE SUN....</span></b><br /><br />THE VEDAS WHICH WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO REFERS TO SARASWATI..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SHIVA WIFE PARVATI ( DEVI/ BHAGAWATI/ DURGA / KALI ) IS A MIGHTY COSMIC ALLEGORY.. IN HER DESTRUCTIVE FORM SHE IS THE BLACK HOLE WHICH CAN DEVOUR ENTIRE GALAXIES IN SECONDS..</span></b><br /><br />LONG AGO WHEN MEAND MY WIFE CLIMBED UP KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN, MANY READERS ASKED ME WHY I DID THAT..<br /><br />WELL MY WIFE DID ORGONE ENERGY MAPPING..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/kudajadri-mountain-chitramoola-cave-adi.html</span><br /><br />IN THE POST ABOVE I WROTE ABOUT DEVI FOLLOWING ADI SHANKARACHARYA AND TELLING HIM NOT TO LOOK BACK.. NOW, DEVI ( WIFE OF SHIVA ) IS ENERGY.. SHE IS NOT A MORTAL WOMAN..<br /><br />THE SPOT ADI SHANKARACHARYA LOOKED BACK, DEVI DISAPPEARED AND HE CONSECRATED THE POWERFUL MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE THERE ..<br /><br />THOUGH THE TEMPLE IS IN KOLOOR KARNATAKA, ONLY MALAYALIS DEVOTEES GO THERE ..WE KNOW WHAT IT IS..<br /><br />THERE ARE UNDERGROUND WATER CHANNELS FROM THE TOP OF KUDAJADRI MOUNTAIN TO THE INNER SANCTUM OF MOOKAMBIKA TEMPLE..<br /><br />DURING THESE RECENT FLOODS THE TEMPLE WAS PARTIALLY SUBERGED..<br /><br />SAME IN GIZA PYRAMIDS.. I HAD WRITTEN ABOUT THE APEX OF THE PYRAMID EMITTING A BLUE PLASMA GLOW WHICH COULD BE SEEN FOR THOUSANDS OF MILES IN ANCIENT TIMES .. THERE ARE WATER CHANNELS FROM THE RIVER NILE UNDER THE PYRAMIDS..<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_34BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_32B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1950966935418826789\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_32M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_28.html?showComment=1535501044602#c1950966935418826789\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 29, 2018 at 5:34 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_32MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE PYRAMIDS IS BUILT ON VAASTU AND SRI YANTRA..</span></b><br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br /><br />JEW ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS , BR AMBEDKAR AND EVR PERIYAR WANTED VEDAS TO BE BURNED AS THEY ARE COWHERDs VERSES.<br /><br />VEDIC SRUTI WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES ( GREATEST FEAT OF MAN ) ONLY BECAUSE DIVINE MATH AND PHYSICS IS EMBEDDED IN THE SANSKRIT VERSES.<br /><br />THESE VERSES CANNOT BE INJECTED WITH POISON\u2014IT WILL SHOW UP LIKE A SORE THUMB..<br /><br />MAGIC IS IN THE SOUND NOT THE MEANING OF THE VERSES , WHICH ARE MOSTY TO INSTILL A SENSE OF GRATITUDE..<br /><br />SOME VERSES HAVE AMAZING MEANING..<br /><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/07/nasadiya-sukta-rig-veda-5000-bc.html</span><br /><br />THE WHITE INVADER LEFT STOLE PART TWO ( BRAHMANAS ) AND PART THREE ( ARANYAKAS ) OF THE VEDAS OF THEY WERE TECHNICAL IN NATURE..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE ...... ( GEOMETRY OF OM -108), ULAM SPIRAL, LUCAS NUMBERS, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC -- EMBEDDED IN IT.&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br />THIS IS WHY WE SAY VEDAS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA BY MAHARISHIS , AND THERE IS NO MORTAL AUTHOR..<br /><br />BY RECITING VEDIC SRUTI EVERY HUMAN CONDITION OR COSMIC CONDITION COULD BE ADDRESSED AND RESOLVED INSTANTLY ..<br /><br />SANATANA DHARMA IS BASED ON THE SCALAR LONGITUDINAL WAVE WHICH TRAVELS FASTER THAN LIGHT..<br /><br />MY WIFE INTEGRATES ISOTOPE MAGIC ( SRUTI VERSES REDUCED TO DIGITS ) INTO HER DISTANT REIKI\u2014TACHYON ENERGY FASTER THAN LIGHT ..<br /><br />MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.20 %</span></b><br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_32BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_32B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_33B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2392855216779193670\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_33M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "163", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7640293973275914121/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "3166658979274725006", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-04-03T10:21:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-12-29T05:48:00+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTE0NTA2NjgwODkwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-part-2.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/3166658979274725006", "title": "KATHAKALI DANCE FORM OF KERALA, part 2  - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 1 , BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Below: The dress for the female Kathakali dancer ( only men are allowed ) is based on HOLIKA who tried to burn nephew Prahalada. &nbsp; &nbsp;She has the magical shawl , which protects her from flames. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">But the boon had a loophole , it could protect only ONE soul. Holika , the sister of &nbsp;Danava King Hiranyakashipu ( seen below ) was burnt to death as she had Prahalada on her lap .. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Holi festival celebrates her death. &nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">We in Kerala do NOT celebrate Holi ..</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/holi-2017-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/holi-2017-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">We in Kerala do NOT celebrate Holi as Hiranyakashipu ( ex-vaikunta gatekeeper of Vishnu Vijaya ) is the ancestor of our beloved Kerala King Mahabali , who ruled the whole planet.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Mahabali offered the whole planet to Vamana avatar which Vishnu covered in one single step. &nbsp;Diwali celebrated this victory of Devas over Danavas --<span style=\"color: red;\">we in Kerala do NOT celebrate Diwali.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/why-kerala-does-not-celebrate-diwali-or.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Danavas are called ASURAS or DEMONS ( evil ) in the endless fight between good ( devas ) &nbsp;and bad forces -- dance of opposite poles which sustain this cosmos at macro and micro levels.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">These are cosmic allegories .</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Below: &nbsp;Danava King Hiranyakashipu with sister Holika</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wou36cUHtGs/WOHNcjsf60I/AAAAAAABSAI/2fD27miGWIo3-S_cJoyRtR-HLxeatQVIgCLcB/s1600/mudrqqa-kathakali-centre.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"416\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wou36cUHtGs/WOHNcjsf60I/AAAAAAABSAI/2fD27miGWIo3-S_cJoyRtR-HLxeatQVIgCLcB/s640/mudrqqa-kathakali-centre.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vishnu in repentance followed good King\nMahabali to Patala ( Peru ) and would NOT go back to Vaikunta &nbsp;. &nbsp;His\nwife Laxmi tied a piece of her saree on Mahabali\u2019s wrist &nbsp;and made him her brother .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">She asked that brother\nMahabali coax her husband Vishnu to go back . &nbsp;This is Rakshabandhan festival.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">We in Kerala do NOT celebrate &nbsp;Rakshabandhan festival</span>\n</span>where sister ties a bracelet on their brothers hands . &nbsp;&nbsp;We were\nat the receiving end , that is why.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any woman can make any man her brother on\nthis day . It happens often that when a woman feels that a man is in love with\nher ( she cannot reciprocate ) she tied a Rakhi and makes him a brother. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Almost like magic , this pesky man ( Romeo )\nwill never pursue her again. &nbsp;Rather he\nwill protect her like his own sister. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Well, we have a priceless culture . &nbsp;We are proud of it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Alexander the Great ( hardcore homosexual ) &nbsp;asked his Indian \u201cwife of convenience\u201d Roxanna\nto tie a Rakhi on King Porus. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;After that it became the responsibility of Porus\nto safeguard his old enemy Alexander who tried to kill him. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Alexander could NOT go back the same way as\nthe Hindu Kush passes were blocked with soldiers waiting in ambush. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Porus gave his ships and allowed Alexander to escape\nto Greece by sea with the help of Porus bypassing the secret passes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/alexander-great-and-king-porus-hidden.html\">&nbsp;http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/alexander-great-and-king-porus-hidden.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/aloe-vera-socotra-vikramaditya-petra.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/aloe-vera-socotra-vikramaditya-petra.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jew Rothschild later controlled these Bolan/\nKhyber passes using his crypto JEW Afridis .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bolan pass had to be swum by men and &nbsp;horses , with only enough width to allow one\nhorse. It was a place for deadly ambush. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I have put real photos in the post below. &nbsp; Now there are roads on which trucks can travel</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real_10.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real_10.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">GETTING BACK TO KATHAKALI--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/TO34t0Vp9Ts/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/TO34t0Vp9Ts?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ANCIENT KATHAKALI DRUMS COULD TALK</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHIVA BEAT HIS DAMARU AND CREATED SANSKRIT&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SANATANA SHARMA IS ROOTED IN SHABDA BRAHMAN --THE LONGITUDINAL SOUND WAVE -- NIKOLA TESLA WAS DEEPLY INTERESTED&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: lime; color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;calibri&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_26.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_26.html</a></span><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">EDAKKA DRUM COULD TALK SANSKRIT AND MANIPRAVALAM ( MALAYALAM COMBO ) &nbsp;-- &nbsp;NOW THIS SKILL IS DEAD.</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue;\">ALL THOSE WHO SAY HINDUISM IS A RELIGION OF HEATHEN PAGAN SAVAGES--PLEASE RAISE YOUR HANDS--</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue;\">OK, PUT IT RIGHT BACK INTO YOUR ASSHOLES&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/m2xeXhWa4bQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/m2xeXhWa4bQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To a white tourist\nKathakali is a BORING performance \u2013because he does NOT understand the story and\nthe glory behind it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kathakali play is\nin the form of verses that are metered and lyrical, &nbsp;sung by vocalists whose voice has been trained\nto various melodies (raga), music and synchronized with the dance-acting on the\nstage.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody can come on stage and just sing. &nbsp;It takes years of voice modulation in\nsynchrony to the steps of the dancer .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vocalists not only\ndeliver the lines, but help set the context and express the inner state of the\ncharacter by modulating their voice. For example, anger is expressed by the use\nof sharp high voice and pleading is expressed by the use of a tired tone for\nthe verse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be in rhythm the\nsinger has to keep his eyes riveted on the actor, for every little body\nmovement has to synchronise with the gong beat.&nbsp;\nThis is opposite to what goes on elsewhere where the dancer follows the\nmusic beat<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Music as a vachika\nelement in Kathakali is designed entirely to enable and enhance\ncharacterisation, and not primarily for expressing classical virtuosity. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sopanam style of\nKathakali is the OLDEST music raga on this planet \u2013 330 centuries old <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It requires phenomenal\nvoice and breath control to hold each moment of a note that much longer,\nwithout in any way lessening the flow and continuity of melody, for two\nsingers, one main and the other who takes up the refrain from where it is left\noff. &nbsp;Sopanam singing requires a &nbsp;voice full of emotion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THUM KHULKE KHEL <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>ULTA SEEDHA MANN KA\nKHAAANA </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">CHOOTIYA</b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">&nbsp; singing\nof Farhan Akthar with a GAREEEB NAWAAZ voice cant do it</span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/TngKqF2JCs8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/TngKqF2JCs8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is &nbsp;a mastery over rhythm, both inherent and\nacquired is a must, for the singer keeps time with his beat on the Gong (if the\nmain singer) and with cymbals (for the second singer).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The singer has to keep\nhis eyes riveted on the actor for every little body movement has to synchronise\nwith the gong beat. So adept are experienced singers that every nuance of a\nmoving facial muscle is anticipated and synchronised with the gong rhythm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The training of a\nsinger for Kathakali is in conjunction with a performing actor,. The singer has\nto control the performance, its tempo and also the percussionists by his acute\nsense of timing. The raga used is entirely governed by the mood and, Kathakali\nmusic has no such qualms, for if the mood demands a certain raga<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apart from the slow\nsinging which is very difficult to master, the fluidity takes years to acquire.\nUnlike classical musicians, a Kathakali musician goes from raga to raga\nseamlessly with no pause. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The drums like the\nEdakka &nbsp;a most versatile instrument &nbsp;can bring out any tonal quality in the world\nand Music is central to a Kathakali performance. It sets the mood and triggers\nemotions resonant with the nature of the scene.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many musical\ninstruments are used in Kathakali. &nbsp;Three\nmajor drums found are Maddalam (barrel shaped), Chenda (cylindrical drum played\nwith curved sticks) and Edakka ( Damaru, hourglass shaped drum ) with muted and\nmelodious notes are played<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A tradition Kathakali\nplay typically consists of two interconnected parts, the third-person Shlokas\nand first-person Padams. The Shlokas are in Sanskrit and describe the action in\nthe scene, while Padams are dialogues in Malayalam (Sanskritized) for the\nactors to interpret and play.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Padam consists of three parts: a Pallavi\n(refrain), Anupallavi (subrefrain) and Caranam (foot), all of which are set to\none of the ancient Ragas (musical mode), based on the mood and context as\noutlined in ancient Sanskrit texts such as the Natya Shastra.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In historic practice of a play performance,\neach Padam was enacted twice by the actor while the vocalists sang the lines\nrepeatedly as the actor-dancer played his role out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Chenda is a Kerala temple drum. &nbsp;It takes decades to master it.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div They are indeed the same, just as musk and its scent are inseparable, or as fire and its heat are nondifferent. Thus Radha and Lord Krsna are one, yet They have taken two forms to enjoy the mellows of pastimes. (Cc. Adi 4.96-98)<br />\n<br />\nisvarera sakti haya e-tina prakara<br />\neka laksmi-gana, pure mahisi-gana ara<br />\nvraje gopi-gana ara sabhate pradhana<br />\nvrajendra-nandana ya'te svayam bhagavan<br />\n<br />\nThe energies (consorts) of the Supreme Lord are of three kinds: the Laksmis in Vaikuntha, the queens in Dvaraka, and the gopis in Vrndavana. The gopis are the best of all, for they have the privilege of serving Sri Krsna, the primeval Lord, the son of the King of Vraja (Cc. Oriya bhajans are all ragas and talas specified by Jayadeva's hymns.<br />\n<br />\nTHE FAKE MUTTS OF ROTHSCHILD SPREAD THE FAKE WORK OF JAYADEVA \"GITA GOVINDA \" IN TAMIL NADU AND ANDHRA.<br />\n<br />\nIn April 16, 2007 Kaun Banega Crorepati (KBC III) mentioned Jayadeva as the court poet of king Lakshmanasena of Bengal. And all Oriya Puri party got pissed off.<br />\n<br />\nThe Italian waitress release tamps of the FAKE jayadeva in 2009. Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik unveiled the stamps at a special function in Jayadev Bhawan<br />\n<br />\nBONGS claim Jayadeva as their own and hold BAUL festival at Kendubilva , west bengal.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The FAKE Geeta-Govinda was full of immoral sex and erotica to describe the ILLICIT love between \"Radha\" and a married Krishna.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Foul and explicit SEXUAL passages were deleted by Jew Rothschild when original Hindu Mutts protested&nbsp;</span><br />\nSome which were considered decent enough are below\u2014just a small example .<br />\n\u0905\u0915\u094d\u0932\u0947\u0936 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u0935 \u092e\u0902\u091c\u0930\u0940 \u0924\u093f\u0932\u0915\u092e\u094d - \u0905\u0937\u094d\u091f\u092a\u0926\u0940 8.<br />\n<br />\n\u0928\u093f\u092d\u0943\u0924 \u0928\u093f\u0915\u0941\u091e\u094d\u091c \u0917\u0943\u0939\u092e\u094d \u0917\u0924\u092f\u093e, \u0928\u093f\u0936\u093f \u0930\u0939\u0938\u093f \u0928\u093f\u0932\u0940\u092f \u0935\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0924\u092e\u094d...<br />\n\u091a\u0915\u093f\u0924 \u0935\u093f\u0932\u094b\u0915\u093f\u0924 \u0938\u0915\u0932 \u0926\u093f\u0936\u093e, \u0930\u0924\u093f \u0930\u092d\u0938\u092d\u0930\u0947\u0923 \u0939\u0938\u0928\u094d\u0924\u092e\u094d<br />\n\u0938\u0916\u093f \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u093f \u092e\u0925\u0928\u092e\u094d \u0909\u0926\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d,<br />\n\u0930\u092e\u092f \u092e\u092f\u093e \u0938\u0939 \u092e\u0926\u0928 \u092e\u0928\u094b\u0930\u0925 \u092d\u093e\u0935\u093f\u0924\u092f\u093e \u0938\u0935\u093f\u0915\u093e\u0930\u092e\u094d... (Dhripad)<br />\n<br />\nOh (girl)friend, one night when I visited a lonely prearranged alcove to meet him, he, that bounteous pleasure-giver was, already there waiting for me but hiding in the darkness... and while I was startled not finding him there and started searching him, he appeared with all <span style=\"color: red;\">his lustful smile looked at me... and then he, filled with hastiness for an intimacy, embraced me..</span>. now why don't you make him take me, when my heart is filled with love for him..<br />\n<br />\n\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0925\u092e \u0938\u092e\u093e\u0917\u092e \u0932\u091c\u094d\u091c\u093f\u0924\u092f\u093e, \u092a\u091f\u0941 \u091a\u093e\u091f\u0941 \u0936\u0924\u0948: \u0905\u0928\u0941\u0915\u0942\u0932\u092e\u094d .<br />\n\u092e\u0943\u0926\u0941 \u092e\u0927\u0941\u0930 \u0938\u094d\u092e\u093f\u0924 \u092d\u093e\u0937\u093f\u0924\u092f\u093e, \u0936\u093f\u0925\u093f\u0932\u0940 \u0915\u0943\u0924 \u091c\u0918\u0928 \u0926\u0941\u0915\u0942\u0932\u092e\u094d<br />\n\u0938\u0916\u093f \u0939\u0947 \u0915\u0947\u0936\u093f... \u0968.<br />\n<br />\n\"On my first meeting I was bashful, but he spoke hundreds of reassuring words, and while I was speaking softly, sweetly, my silken dress slipped off my hips making me nude ... now why don't you make him to take delight in me, when my heart and mind are filled with love for him...<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_14MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_14BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px;
