max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1738415637036876269\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_179M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_28.html?showComment=1498826321269#c1738415637036876269\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 30, 2017 at 6:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_179MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.newindianexpress.com/opinions/columns/s-gurumurthy/2017/jun/06/against-fraud-or-against-freedom-mr-roy-1613261--1.html<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO MEDIA COMPANIES START SUBSIDIARIES-- TV CHANNELS WHICH NOBODY WATCHES?<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS NOBODY SEEING THE ANGLE OF TAX EVASION AND SIPHONING OFF FUNDS ?<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO HONEST COMPANIES REQUIRES LAYERS ( SHELL COMPANIES ) --LIKE THE MAFIA DON<br />\n<br />\nCompanies are frequently owned by other companies.<br />\n<br />\nIntertwined ownership structures can make it difficult to understand how a company operates, what parts of it are regulated by which government entities<br />\n<br />\nParent companies are those that own enough stock in another company (called a subsidiary) to control it.<br />\n<br />\nA holding company is a corporation that owns stock in other companies. A pure holding company is established only to hold shares in other companies. A large holding company can control many individual companies.<br />\n<br />\nFor example, Sears Holdings Corp. has among its subsidiaries Kmart Corp., Lands\u2019 End, Inc. and Sears, Roebuck and Co.<br />\n<br />\nA shell company is a business entity that is not actively engaged in business and has no ( or chaatne ke vaaste ) assets. They are used for money laundering and tax avoidance schemes.<br />\n<br />\nPublicly traded shell companies are used in reverse mergers, when a private company buys the shell, allowing it to be traded on the market without going through the required initial public offering.<br />\n<br />\nA holding company is a company that owns other companies' outstanding stock. The term usually refers to a company that does not produce goods or services itself; rather, its purpose is to own shares of other companies to form a corporate group.<br />\n<br />\nHolding companies allow the reduction of risk for the owners and can allow the ownership and control of a number of different companies.A holding company has a sole purpose to exercise control over other companies, called the subsidiaries. The holding company does not produce any goods nor services of its own, and it accumulates the profits of its subsidiaries.<br />\n<br />\nIn the United States, 80% or of stock, in voting and value, must be owned before tax consolidation benefits such as tax-free dividends can be claimed.<br />\n<br />\nThat is, if Company A owns 80% or more of the stock of Company B, Company A will not pay taxes on dividends paid by Company B to its stockholders, as the payment of dividends from B to A is essentially Company<br />\n<br />\nA transferring cash from one company to the other. Any other shareholders of Company B will pay the usual taxes on dividends, as they are legitimate and ordinary dividends to these shareholders.<br />\n<br />\nA parent company is a company that owns enough voting stock in another firm (subsidiary) to control management and operations by influencing or electing its board of directors. A parent company could simply be a company that wholly owns another company, which is then known as a \"wholly owned subsidiary\").<br />\n<br />\nWhen an existing company establishes a new company and keeps majority shares with itself, and invites other companies to buy minority shares, it is called a parent company.<br />\n<br />\nA dummy corporation or dummy company is an entity created to serve as a front or cover for one or more companies. It can have the appearance of being real (logo, website, and sometimes employing actual staff), but lacks the capacity to function independently. The dummy corporation's sole purpose is to protect \"an individual or another corporation from liability in either contract or import\"<br />\n<br />\nTypically, the dummy companies are established in an international location, usually by the \"attorney or bagman\" of the creator in order to conceal the true owner of the often-illegitimate and empty company<br />\n<br />\nThe international security corporation Blackwater Worldwide were reported to have obtained over thirty dummy corporations in order to secure million dollar contracts from the United States government. After the backlash from Blackwater's \"reckless misconduct\" in Iraq, the security corporation successfully obtained lucrative American contracts under several subsidiaries<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_179BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_179b+seedBEBND\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_178T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_179b+seedBEBND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_178TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_178TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_178TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_179b+seedBEBND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_178TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_178TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_179b+seedBEBND\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_178TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_178TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_178TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_179b+seedBEBND\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_178B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6510944046850994017\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_178M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_28.html?showComment=1498826370515#c6510944046850994017\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 30, 2017 at 6:09 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_178MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nDummy corporations may be created to avoid tax through disguising the true profits of a corporation through the use of tax havens. The use of tax havens are particularly popular in the British Virgin Islands and many dummy corporations are created on the islands as a way to evade taxes.<br />\n<br />\nDummy corporations may be created by fraudsters to create the illusion of being an existing corporation with a similar name. Similar to the \"pump and dump\" scheme, Fraudsters mislead investors in order to sell securities in the dummy corporation, in this case, making investors incorrectly believe \"that they are buying shares in the real corporation\". The sale of securities through a fraudulent corporation is inherently illegal<br />\n<br />\nAnother use is to prevent speculators from intruding on imminent plans of the parent organisation. Dummy corporations may also be used in crime to hide the identity of a criminal, similar to the use of a criminal alias.<br />\n<br />\nA dummy corporation is one way to cook the books in a dishonest attempt to hide the true financial status of a company.<br />\n<br />\nTax avoidance techniques for multinational companies are all about location. They consist of where a company chooses to open offices and create subsidiaries, and where it chooses to allocate its profits and expenses.<br />\n<br />\nCompanies who want to minimise their tax bills shift their profits to subsidiaries<br />\nwhere there is a low or zero tax regime, e.g. a tax haven, and therefore pay less tax on them while they try to record their expenses in high tax jurisdictions that often offer good rates of tax relief.<br />\n<br />\nThey use a number of techniques to artificially move their money around, including using tax havens, manipulating prices and creating artificial structures that have little to no real economic value.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://fortune.com/2016/03/11/apple-google-taxes-eu/<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_179b+seedBEBND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_179b+seedBEBND\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4433542794035740670\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_58M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic.html?showComment=1499054618933#c6555740062745457471\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 3, 2017 at 9:33 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_188MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/beijing-using-doklam-to-arm-twist-delhi-on-obor/articleshow/59416451.cms<br />\n<br />\nCHINESE ECONOMY IS SINKING.. A BUBBLE WITHIN A BUBBLE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nCHINA KO L0DA LAGNE WAALAH HAI\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCHINAs SURVIVAL DEPENDS ON OBOR\u2026..CHINAs DEBT TO GDP RATIO IS A SHOCKING 400 % (total Chinese debt at all levels (household, corporate, bank and government)) .....<br />\n<br />\nConstruction and debt is driving China's growth.. Chinese Government rely on infrastructure development to sustain artificial growth.. China has a 7.9 trillion USD shadow banking sector\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOn May 24th 2017 , the rating agency Moody\u2019s downgraded China\u2019s credit rating for the first time since 1989 on concerns over rising debt and slowing economic growth\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe IMF forecast China\u2019s gross domestic product to grow 6.7 per cent this year --the real rate is just 3.9%..<br />\n<br />\nMost of the debt is coming from the Chinese corporate sector. Unlike USA these are mostly state-owned enterprises, controlled by the Chinese government.....<br />\n<br />\nIt does not include the WMPs, which are technically investments kept off the balance sheets of the book. A wealth management product is an uninsured financial product sold in China by banks and other financial institutions. Typically they offer a high rate of interest, and, sometimes, guaranteed return. ..<br />\n<br />\nIt also does not include provincial obligations that take the form of guarantees. Those will have to be bailed out by Beijing\u2026<br />\n<br />\nChinese banks rely on sales of new WMPs to redeem the old ones at maturity. Today, when a customer wants his money back, the bank sells a new WMP, and uses that money to cash out the redeeming customer. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe banks use sales of WMPs to invest in the riskiest development projects and state-owned enterprises (SOEs) on the edge of bankruptcy\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe new investor steps into the shoes of the old with the same bad underlying investment\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThese institutions behind these projects, financed by the original WMPs, cannot repay them. So most of the WMPs will never be repaid\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThat means they may have to be bailed-out by the government when the bubble bursts-- when the system finally crumbles\u2026<br />\n<br />\nChinese WMPs\u2019 are the greatest Ponzi scheme in history\u2014a scheme devised by MAD MEN ..<br />\n<br />\nWMPs are something like the collateralized debt obligations (CDOs)-- the pooled assets \u2013 such as mortgages, bonds and loans \u2013 are essentially debt obligations that serve as collateral for the CDO\u2026<br />\n<br />\nMuch of Chinese debt is denominated in U.S. dollars so the situation is made even worse by the strong dollar and the global dollar shortage. Both of those factors make dollar-denominated debt much harder to repay\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe debt system is propped up \u2014 for now \u2014 by more debt and dishonest Chinese state accounting. If the banks were forced to write-down bad loans, the system would have collapsed a long time ago\u2026<br />\n<br />\nLIKE BIHARI EXAM TOPPER CHEATS--\u2026HOW LONG WILL CHINA CHEAT BY TABULLASSSANN ?....<br />\n<br />\nBut one dysfunction that cannot be finessed is cash-flow. As every entrepreneur and small businessperson knows, cash never lies. You either have it or you don\u2019t\u2026<br />\n<br />\nBecause of excessive debt and inability to pay, cash flow problems are now reaching epidemic proportions in China\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nClearly there are no easy answers to China\u2019s debt problem\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe only painless escape would be on a wave of economic growth-- and China thinks their OBOR road will solve it ( DUMPING GOODS ) -- B A LL S IT WILL TAKE OFF !...<br />\n<br />\nChina is faced with a mountain of unpayable debt, weaker growth, and a stronger dollar that will make the debt even harder to repay. The Chinese credit bubble has only one feasible solution, China must use its hard currency reserves to bail-out the entire banking and SOE sector and try to start over with a relatively clean balance sheet\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nUSA HAS 20 TRILLION USD DEBT--WHICH JEW OBAMA NEVER SPOKE ABOUT DURING HIS TWO TERMS OF PRESIDENCY. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe G7 nations are a bunch of beggars -- Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan and the UK\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nONLY INDIA HAS A HEALTHY ECONOMY\u2026.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_188BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_184TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_184TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_188b+seedHYDQD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_184B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7722086941843067889\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_184M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic.html?showComment=1499054699281#c7722086941843067889\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 3, 2017 at 9:34 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_184MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nOUR GROWTH TODAY IS 10.1 % .. OUR TRAITOR MAIN STEAM MEDIA AND THEIR FOREIGN PAYROLL DESH DROHIS LOVES TO RUN DOWN INDIAs ECONOMY\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCurrently, Chinese shadow banks fund approximately 24 % of Chinese debt\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWith the global slowdown, many of China\u2019s factories closed resulting in approximately 20 million workers unemployed. China\u2019s leaders responded by instituting a $600 billion stimulus plan to build and boost the nation\u2019s infrastructure and provide jobs to its people and dump these goods on the OBOR road\u2026<br />\n<br />\nFor the next few years China is unlikely to manage growth rates above 3.8% on an average\u2014hence this headlong rush into ONE BELT ONE ROAD\u2026.<br />\nStimulus is becoming less effective, requiring four units of credit for each unit of growth. If this trend continues, China and its local government entities will pay much more in order to borrow and ultimately get a lower return on every unit borrowed..<br />\n<br />\nIf interest rates in the United States continue to rise, funds will flee China, causing immense capital outflows. If President Trump imposes tariffs on Chinese goods into the United States, this will reduce demand causing China\u2019s economy to slow down--OBOR road or no OBOR road\u2026<br />\n<br />\nChina\u2019s growth has been largely driven by investment, but this has started to slow because of declines in infrastructure and property investment\u2026<br />\n<br />\nRecent Chinese growth has primarily been driven by the real estate bubble, and that too in second tier cities. First tier cities are saturated and they don\u2019t want negative publicity from western tourists \u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe Chinese have a middle-class of several hundred million people with a high propensity to save. Most Chinese don\u2019t get to invest overseas, so they are limited to real estate, gold and local investment products, mostly sold through banks\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhen customers go into a bank, they are offered a standard bank deposit paying about 2%, or a \u201cwealth management product,\u201d (WMP) that pays about 8%....<br />\n<br />\nMany customers naturally take the 8% return and invest in bank-managed WMPs. Customers believe the WMPs are guaranteed by the bank or the government. They\u2019re not \u2014 WMPs are just unsecured investments\u2026.<br />\nAlong with wealth management products from banks, online lenders are jumping into the game, adding to the risks. There are PONZI online Chinese finance companies fleecing merrily\u2026<br />\n<br />\nChina has depended on debt to grow its economy. China uses debt as the key mechanism to build its infrastructure and expand businesses\u2026 However, the problem is that private and public debt are not only linked, but that both are growing at unsustainable rates . To expand their operations and be competitive, businesses borrow through bank loans and issuing bonds. \u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThis expansive lending has occurred for over a decade resulting in $23,600 in bank loans, bonds, and other debt obligations for each person in China. The problem is that businesses in China are state-owned enterprises (SOEs) run and owned by the government in order to keep people working. ..<br />\n<br />\nLoans come mainly from state-owned banks resulting in money being shifted from one pocket to another in the Chinese government accounting methodology\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCompounding matters is that Chinese businesses often guarantee each other\u2019s loans and debt obligations. This way of doing business makes it easier for a company to obtain a loan that would otherwise be very difficult. The state-owned banks complicate this situation by lending primarily to SOEs since they have implied governmental guarantees\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThere is also the role of shadow banking. Shadow banking is bank-mediated business-to-business loans, allowing lending to occur when a potential borrower has been refused by a Chinese bank or not able to float a bond offering..<br />\n<br />\nMortgage lending has increased sharply, and made up the largest share of bank loans..<br />\n<br />\nShadow banking is booming in China..<br />\n<br />\nChinese growth ( unlike India ) is still driven mainly by debt-fuelled spending and \u00adexports..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_184MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_184BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_184B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_185B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6744431754595012386\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_185M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic.html?showComment=1499054772597#c6744431754595012386\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 3, 2017 at 9:36 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nChina has an insatiable demand for credit. With stringent controls on banking activities, shadow banking had spiraled high with a debt-to-GDP ratio climbing to a towering 300%. China will NOT admit this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nChina is now this planets No 1 in shadow-banking asset and No 1 in the shadow-banking sector\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe most popular forms of shadow banking, are so-called entrusted loan agreements and trust loans. Under the former, a company lends money to another firm with the bank as the middleman, while for the latter, banks use money raised from wealth-management products to invest in a trust plan, with the proceeds eventually going to a corporate borrower\u2026<br />\n<br />\nShadow banking, a term for financial agents that perform bank-like activity but are not regulated as banks, has boomed in China,as a way of circumventing government's tight controls on lending. This has been a key driver of the breakneck growth in debt in the economy..<br />\n<br />\nChina is doing endless propaganda about its Eurasian connectivity scheme,-- the One Belt One Road (OBOR), or the Belt Road Initiative (BRI)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThere is this land-based \"Silk Road Economic Belt\" (SREB) and the oceangoing \"Maritime Silk Road\" (MSR)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIndia does NOT benefit from the land based connectivity\u2014and we don\u2019t need China\u2019s permission to use the sea..<br />\n<br />\nThe strategy underlines China's push to take a larger role in global affairs, and the desire to coordinate manufacturing capacity with other countries\u2014in reality DUMPING their goods which they keep producing to show some GDP growth \u2026<br />\n<br />\n2017 will see over 2,000 trains travel from a dozen Chinese cities to over 20 European destinations on newly built lines and tunnels in Central Asia. Its primary goal is to integrate the rich European economy with that of China\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe shorter term goal is for China to emerge as the dominant regional power in its neighborhood\u2014never mind its humongous debt . China's total debt is equivalent to more than 300 % of its nominal GDP\u2026<br />\n<br />\nPaying off that debt requires growth, but the growth itself is fueled by more debt. China is now at the point where enormous new debt is required to achieve only modest new growth. This is clearly non-sustainable\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nYou\u2019re a middle-class Chinese saver and you walk into a bank. They offer you two investment options. The first is a bank deposit that pays about 2%. The other is a WMP ( wealth management products ) that pays about 7%. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nIn the past ten years, bank customers have chosen almost $12 trillion of WMPs. That might be fine if WMPs were like high-quality corporate or municipal bonds. They\u2019re not. They\u2019re more like the biggest Ponzi scheme in history\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWhat happens when a WMP matures? Usually the bank customer is encouraged to rollover the investment into a new WMP. What happens if the customer wants her money back? The bank sells a new WMP to another customer, then uses those sales proceeds to redeem the first customer. The new customer now steps into the shoes of the first customer with the same pile of bad debt. That\u2019s where the Ponzi dynamic comes in\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nSimply put, most of the debts backing up the WMPs cannot be repaid, which means it\u2019s just a matter of time before the WMP market goes into a full meltdown and triggers a banking panic\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nFinally, there is an infrastructure bubble. China has kept its growth engine humming mostly with investment instead of aggregate demand from consumers\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nChina projected false growth rates by currency manipulation and shadow banking. Chinese economy is run by MAD men. Ghost cities of China are an example of that which no society should imitate\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nAbout half of China\u2019s investment in the past ten years has been wasted on \u201cghost cities,\u201d white elephant transportation facilities, and prestige projects that look good superficially, but that don\u2019t produce enough revenue or efficiencies to pay for themselves. Much of this investment was financed with debt. If the project itself is not revenue producing then the associated debt cannot be repaid, and will go into default\u2026.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_185MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_185BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_185B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_186B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4222521963938347678\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_186M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic.html?showComment=1499054853294#c4222521963938347678\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 3, 2017 at 9:37 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_186MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nThe toxic combination of government debt, corporate debt, WMPs, and unrealistic growth expectations have set up China for the greatest market crash in history\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe tail wags the Chinese dog . To achieve the goal of \u201cpower projection\u201d, China started to build the huge piles of forex reserves (Treasury bonds). They did not even bother if the main portion of their money is getting locked in USA\u2019s Treasury bonds. \u2026<br />\n<br />\nChina is the biggest holder of USA Treasury bonds. Why would a country hold so much of bonds of other countries? The answer is, \u201cto manipulate\u201d. Interestingly when China holds USA Treasury bonds, the return on those bonds are mere 1%. . The best way to arm twist USA is to pump-or-pull these money holdings at will\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWith aging, infra and the majority of funds locked in 1% type of investments, Chinese premier gets a CHINKERILAL KE RANGEEN SAPNE . And the dream is \u201cOBOR\u201d\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIndia\u2019s geographical location is a huge advantage, especially for the maritime leg of the OBOR scheme in the IOR\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWe will build our own ports in the south west tip of India to snuff out Singapore and Colombo..<br />\n<br />\nUnder OBOR Initiative, hefty amount of loans will be pumped into the developing countries. This will benefit China and NOT these nations who will receive these Chinese loans\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThis is intended to generate demand for the sale of products of Chinese steel mills, cement plants and construction companies, which could help this country to maintain employment at home intact. China to bring the neighbouring countries within its economic orbit and thereby maintain regional hegemony\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOnce a country falls in China\u2019s debt trap, it becomes far difficult to get out of it\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nChina uses its clout on the aid receiving countries to pressurize them to work in its own interest. It was on this ground that Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar and Thailand were pressurized by China to desist from forming common stand against its territorial claims in South China Sea\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nSri Lanka\u2019s government decided to sell 80 per cent stakes in Hambantota port to China for US $ 1.1 billion. In order to ensure that the aid-recipient countries do not escape its debt trap, China reschedules repayment in exchange for major new contracts by giving kickbacks to corrupt politicians \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOften, dumping of goods by China in the loan-recipient countries negatively impact the growth of local industries, which takes away the jobs of the local workers. Bribery by the Chinese companies in the loan-recipient countries is well known\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nOBOR initiative is more as a means of commercial penetration and attaining strategic leverage with neo-colonial designs\u2014and Jew Rothschild / Bilderberg Club is part of this scheme\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild wants to project China as the only force to contain the USA, globally. Chinese communism was CREATED by Jew Rothschild\u2026.<br />\n<br />\n1% return on its locked-money is China\u2019s Achilles heel and OBOR is its remedy\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThere has been NO risk assessment by bribed leaders -- Anti-dumping rules must be clear\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nThe greatest threat to Chinese output in the manufacturing sector in India\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCHINESE ECONOMY IS RUN BY MAN MEN WHO HAVE NO IDEA OF THE BASIC PRINCIPLES OF ECONOMICS..<br />\n<br />\nChina\u2019s GDP growth was 6.7 % ( INFLATED ) last year, the lowest for 26 years\u2026. Chinese economy is credit-driven\u2014and hence the headline GDP figures cannot be trusted nor can the growth be trusted . This is commonsense . Half wits ( 99% celebrated Rothschild\u2019s economists are ) cannot understand this..<br />\n<br />\nThe Chinese National Bureau of Statistics (NBS), is in cahoots with mad men who cook up fake statistics\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHot money trapped inside China is blowing up financial bubbles rather than going into productive investments. There is nothing sustainable about the current \u2018stabilisation\u2019 of the economy; it has been achieved by inflating new debt-financed bubbles (housing and commodities) to fill the gap left by the collapse of the previous bubble (stock market)\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 5--</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_187B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4355739368452668872\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_187M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. It is about regime survival for a Chinese Communist Party that faces existential risk if they stumble\u2026<br />\n<br />\nLocal banks are struggling with non-performing debt rapidly increasing. Non-bank financial institutions referred to as the \u201cshadow banking system\u201d are spreading, with little regulation or recognition of the risks\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nWith reduced global trade, China began to lose competitiveness in the market place. Inflation of the money supply in the Chinese economy required higher wages to offset rising prices..<br />\n<br />\nINDIA IS THIS PLANETs HEALTHIEST ECONOMY\u2026<br />\n<br />\nChina kick started its economy by taking advantage of low wages to sell products they could produce themselves to advanced economies\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WILL SOON BE A REVOLUTION IN THE WEST OF CHINA.. THE CHINESE MUSLIMS WILL TRIGGER THIS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThere is unemployment, and the people are poor in the west of china and internal china.. east coast of China is NOT China<br />\n<br />\nCHINA IS ON THE BRINKS OF MASSIVE SOCIAL AND POLITICAL UNREST IN THE WEST OF CHINA\u2026<br />\n<br />\nChina\u2019s success with boosting low-cost goods in advanced economies resulted in an investment boom by Westerners in China. ..<br />\n<br />\n25 years ago my wife asked me-- HOW COME WE GET ONLY CHINESE SHIT STUFF IN US MALLS?...<br />\n<br />\nChina has a massive industrial system linked to the appetites of the United States and Europe. It is losing competitive advantage at the same time that political systems in some of these countries are generating new barriers to Chinese exports--whether JEW ROTHSCHILD likes it or not\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf India boycotts Chinese goods\u2014China is in deep shit\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIt will be a long time before the Chinese economy generates enough demand to consume what its industrial system can produce\u2026<br />\n<br />\nEconomically, China needs a powerful recession to get rid of businesses being kept alive by loans. Politically, China can\u2019t afford the cost of unemployment. ..<br />\n<br />\nTrump had threatened to label China a currency manipulator and impose hefty tariffs on imports of Chinese goods\u2026<br />\n<br />\nPresident Donald Trump is threatening the one thing that China cannot withstand: limits on China\u2019s economic links to the United States. ..<br />\n<br />\nFaced with this same problem in the past, Japan turned into a low-growth, but stable, country. But Japan did not have 1 billion impoverished people to deal with, nor did it have a history of social unrest and revolution\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nIn reality is reality. China no longer is the top owner of U.S. government debt; Japan is\u2026<br />\n<br />\nPOOR CHINA\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nTHROW A CHAPPATI PIECE IN THEIR GENERAL DIRECTION\u2026\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_188b+seedHYDQD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_188b+seedHYDQD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3019783879473757812\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_151M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In India MCA ( Ministry of Corporate affairs ) cancelled the registration of around 2,09,032 defaulting companies and the Ministry of Finance directed banks to restrict operations of bank accounts of such companies by the directors of such companies or their authorized representatives. Following this, MCA has identified 1,06,578 directors for disqualification under Section 164(2)(a) of the Companies Act, 2013, as on 12 September 2017.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Almost all shell companies hold assets only on paper and not in reality. These companies conduct almost no economic activity.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are about 1.5 million registered companies in India, --- only 590,000 companies file their annual return.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_10.html?showComment=1507600455479#c5750861595378403530\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 10, 2017 at 7:24 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_15MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSLAVERY AND JEW ROTHSCHILD GO TOGETHER<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/black-african-slave-trade-and-jews-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THE SANDINISTAS FREEDOM FIGHTER KICKED OUT THE JEW PRESIDENT AND THE BLOODSUCKING JEWS ( WHO CORNERED ALL THE WEALTH ) THREE AMERICAN PRESIDENTS ( REAGAN/ BUSH SR/ CLINTON ) FUNDED CONTRAS TO TO BIOLOGICAL AND CHEMICAL WARFARE ON THE HAPLESS NICARAGUAN PEOPLE..<br />\n<br />\nDONT EVER THINK THIS CAN BE BURIED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD MONOPOLISED MEDIA / HOLLYWOOD<br />\n<br />\nPOM ( USA ) was enlisted in a project with the Stormont labs of Woodland, California, and the Wackenhut Corporation to develop chemical and biological weapons that could be deployed in guerrilla warfare. POM was assigned the task of producing the munitions themselves.<br />\n<br />\nPOM ( Park On Meter ) was founded by Seth Ward Sr., the father of Walter Hubbell\u2019s wife, Suzie. While an attorney at Rose Law firm, Hubbell had shepherded POM\u2019s application to become the first company to receive an industrial development loan from the Arkansas Development Finance Authority<br />\n<br />\nWEBSTER HUBBEL IS CHELSEA CLINTONs BIOLOGICAL FATHER<br />\n<br />\nWebster Hubbell ( SEXUAL AFFAIR WITH HILLARY CLINTON ) - he served on POM's board during the early '80s.. While a partner at Rose, Hubbell served as POM's lawyer<br />\n<br />\nPOM, it has been alleged by Michael Riconosciuto, a GENIUS computer expert serving a prison sentence on drug charges in Washington state, was under secret contract to make components of prototype chemical and biological weapons for use by the Contras<br />\n<br />\nPark-On-Meter was the first company to receive a loan from the Arkansas Development Finance Authority (ADFA) set up by Arkansas Governor Bill Clinton in 1985. The ADFA took over much of the state's bond-issuing power and gave the governor Bill Clinton the ability \"essentially to create money\".<br />\n<br />\nThe ADFA has no regulator and no legislative oversight. The governor appoints the board and has the right to approve or disapprove every bond issue. There is virtually no limit on the value of bonds that can be issued. One financial advisor described this scenario as a \"prescription for abuse\".<br />\n<br />\nARKANSAS WAS A HUB FOR MONEY LAUNDERING VIA SHELL COMPANIES --THANKS TO ROTHSCHILD AGENT BILL CLINTON<br />\n<br />\nThis ADFA was at the center of financial dealings in which large amounts of money could be moved around easily , discreetly.<br />\n<br />\nTheoretically, bonds could be issued to provide a loan to a company involved in laundering drug profits. That loan represented clean money. The loan could in turn be paid back with drug profits, slowly over time and in small increments. In this way drug money could be successfully filtered into the legitimate financial system.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_15BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 16, 2017 at 8:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_62MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.ibtimes.co.in/shell-companies-govt-probe-found-1-3-lakh-firms-operating-without-pan-749594<br />\n<br />\nMODI KEEPS STIRRING THE POT FOR VOTES<br />\n<br />\nMODI HAS ALLOWED COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TO SHIT ON BHARATMATAs FACE</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3934132810452958214\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_104M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_16.html?showComment=1518860513104#c3934132810452958214\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 17, 2018 at 3:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_104MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDiamond traders have a modus operandi. They file false cases against select customers and agencies to smother them mentally. They have help from judges/ lawyers. All of them operate dozens of SHELL companies<br />\n<br />\nROUND TRIPPING in diamonds (or repeated export and import of same polished diamonds) is wherein traders undertake a series of exports and imports of the same goods for the purpose of receiving greater bank financing.<br />\n<br />\nHypothetically, if a parcel made five round trips it means that for every $1 million worth of polished goods, the exporter got $5 million in financing.<br />\n<br />\nROUND TRIPPING is DELIBERATELY allowed for big corporate businesses ( who donate to the ruling party ) which bring back their black money through bogus shell companies . These funds are invested in the economy as FDI.<br />\n<br />\nRound-tripping ( phudia ghumao ) of diamond consignments from one market to another is practised among the diamond trading circle in Mumbai. The bogus trade enables a diamond trading company to artificially inflate balance sheets for raising loans.<br />\n<br />\nBank managers get bribes in foreign accounts or get paid in Bitocin for services rendered . This is why maximum Bitcoin acitivity happens in Surat\u2014the ADDA of crypto Jew diamond traders<br />\n<br />\nThere is a clear link between round-tripping and bank financing.This is NO big secret. When you donate to both ruling and opposition parties you can get away with anything.<br />\n<br />\nROUND TRIPPING is a phenomenon by which Indian individuals and companies avoid tax by sending funds abroad and then bringing them back on to home soil via Mauritius-based companies. Much of the investment into India via Mauritius over the last 15 years is believed to have been by CORRUPT Indian residents\u2014all BIG FISH<br />\n<br />\nSigned in 1983, the Double Taxation Avoidance treaty between the two countries made Mauritius, which taxes capital gains at near-zero rates, an attractive \u201cpost box address\u201d for foreign investors to route investments into India Indians who evaded taxes set up shell companies in Mauritius, concealing identities and channeling cash or stock market investments through \u201cround tripping\u201d and \u201cparticipatory notes\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe Securities and Exchange Board of India (Sebi) tightened the norms for participatory notes (P-notes) in order to check misuse of these instruments in round-tripping and money laundering.<br />\n<br />\nMauritius had become the top source of FDI into the country only due to ROUND TRIPPING.<br />\n<br />\nMauritius had been the source of more than 37% of all foreign direct investment inflows into India between 2000 and 2015.<br />\n<br />\nFew months ago, India and Singapore signed a pact for amendment of the Double Taxation Avoidance Agreement (DTAA), in a bid to curb illegal hoarding of money and to prevent round-tripping of funds, misused for tax evasion. This was done for Mauritius and Cyprus earlier<br />\n<br />\nA special-purpose entity (SPE; or, in Europe and India, special-purpose vehicle/SPV, or, in some cases in each EU jurisdiction \u2013 FVC, financial vehicle corporation) is a legal entity (usually a limited company of some type or, sometimes, a limited partnership) created to fulfill narrow, specific or temporary objectives.<br />\n<br />\nSPEs are typically used by companies to isolate the firm from financial risk. They are also commonly used to hide debt (inflating profits), hide ownership, and obscure relationships between different entities which are in fact related to each other.<br />\n<br />\nNormally a company will transfer assets to the SPE for management or use the SPE to finance a large project thereby achieving a narrow set of goals without putting the entire firm at risk.<br />\n<br />\nSPEs are also commonly used in complex financings to separate different layers of equity infusion. Commonly created and registered in tax havens, SPEs allow tax avoidance strategies unavailable in the home district.<br />\n<br />\nRound-tripping is one such strategy. In addition, they are commonly used to own a single asset and associated permits and contract rights (such as an apartment building or a power plant), to allow for easier transfer of that asset.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_102B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5534687230680852345\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_102MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nIndia\u2019s diamond export figures are false and manipulative. An export of 40 billion USD worth of polished diamonds and the import of $30 billion worth of polished diamonds \u2013 is classic example of round-tripping.<br />\n<br />\nIndia is a POLISHED diamond exporter and there is no need for importing POLISHED diamonds. Sab mil bhaantke khate hein.<br />\n<br />\nInstead of nipping round tripping in the bud \u2013 the Indian govt just imposed a miniscule import duty.<br />\n<br />\nHow did the practice of round-tripping start? It all started as an unexpected CRYPTO JEW GUJARATI arm of the diamond industry\u2019s request to the government to change the way it was taxed. Instead of being taxed on profit, like most other industries, it sought to be taxed on turnover, like the diamond trade in Israel.<br />\n<br />\nThe govt promptly scrapped three duties on POLISHED diamond imports<br />\n<br />\nRound-tripping became an economical practice since then, a completely new way to make money from diamonds.<br />\n<br />\nThe KAHAAANI was that that our enterprising CRYPTO JEW Gujarati diamond processors who had mining licenses in African countries where they mined, processed and wanted to bring back polished diamonds to India.<br />\n<br />\nSee they love Bharatmata so much\u2014these crypto Jew Gujarati desh bhakts ( SIC ) must be given ZERO percent 0% duty right?<br />\n<br />\nThe message from the Indian Govt was\u2014HAPPY KOSHER ROUND TRIPPING !<br />\n<br />\nPOLITICAL DONNASSANN BHOOLNA MATH !<br />\n<br />\nIndia\u2019s gross polished diamond export was at least 15 billion USD MORE than the value of diamonds sold by retailers worldwide .. The export figures is clearly inflated.<br />\n<br />\nWhere did the diamonds disappear? Dubai. The UAE, India\u2019s top export destination, kept only 6.8 per cent of the BILLONS of polished diamonds it imported from India. Rest of the consignment went back and forth between India and the UAE, four to five times before they went down the pipeline.<br />\n<br />\nNow let\u2019s see the nexus between round-tripping and bank financing. If a parcel made four round trips for the sake of financing, it meant that for every $1 million worth of goods, the exporter got $5 million in financing. A good arrangement only as long as you could pay it back.<br />\n<br />\nSince this heavy financing is borrowed without matching collateral ( on pressure from politicians ), the diamond-financing banks in India are jittery. The bank managers are convenient scapegoats<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU THINK CRYPTO JEW GUJARATI DIAMOND TRADERS HAVE OFFICES IN DUBAI\u2014IN DUBAI PEOPLE BUY PEARLS-NEVER DIAMONDS !<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU THINK DUBAI HAS SUCH A HUGE HAWALA MARKET ?<br />\n<br />\nDubai is a safe haven for the Indian traders who indulged in \u2018round tripping\u2019. Dubai does not impose any tax on either import or export of diamonds. It merely acted as a \u2018trading ground\u2019 as consumption of polished goods in Dubai was minimal.<br />\n<br />\nBlack money is sent to Dubai through hawala transaction (an illegal banking system). Here money is deposited there in the bank account of a diamond dealer. A parcel of diamonds is then sold by that company, that\u2019s paid for with the hawala money.<br />\n<br />\nThe parcel is then re-imported and traded several times. This is done to bring the black money into the system. And once it is done, it is brought back into the country and deployed in the markets in the form of overseas investments, sub-accounts or portfolio investments<br />\n<br />\nCrypto Jew Gujarati diamond company has branches all over the world, it doesn\u2019t really mean that they are supplying diamonds in every country. It could just be a \u2018pit stop\u2019 for a diamond parcel that travels from one branch office to another in different countries ... at times to three or four branch offices in the guise of \u2018export\u2019.<br />\n<br />\nSo, in each country the value of the polished goods is inflated to cover the borrowing rate in the previous country. So, a single consignment of diamonds can generate five times its value in loans.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_102MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_102BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_102B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_103B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7011116652235957486\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_103M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. This was a classic example of \u2018round tripping\u2019 for a country like India, which is a processor and exporter of polished diamonds - all done to misuse bank finance.<br />\n<br />\nIn Kerala round tripping happens with GOLD ! Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">February 24, 2018 at 3:20 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_218MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-asks-centre-to-curb-illegal-operations-of-multinational-auditors/articleshow/63050804.cms<br />\n<br />\nONLY NOW THEY ARE WAKING UP....<br />\n<br />\nMORE THAN A YEAR AFTER I EXPOSED ENRON ..<br />\n<br />\nENRON USED THEIR OWN AUDITORS TO COVER UP THEIR GIGANTIC FRAUD...<br />\n<br />\nEnron's board members, regulators, analysts, auditors, and even politicians looked the other way while Enron committed its fraud.<br />\n<br />\nFollowing the 2001 scandal in which energy giant Enron was found to have reported $100bn in revenue through institutional and systematic accounting fraud, Arthur Andersen's performance and alleged complicity as an auditor came under intense scrutiny.<br />\n<br />\nOn June 15, 2002, Andersen was convicted of obstruction of justice for shredding documents related to its audit of Enron, resulting in the Enron scandal.<br />\n<br />\nMind you Arthur Anderson LLP had 28,000 employees in the US and 85,000 worldwide..<br />\n<br />\nDeliberate FALSE auditing made sure that Enron appeared to be much more profitable than it actually was.<br />\n<br />\nNaturally, its share price zoomed, allowing the managers to benefit from the capital gains that they received from their employee-stock options and performance-related bonuses.<br />\n<br />\nCriminal auditors over inflated so much that it became extremely hard for Enron\u2019s managers to carry on with this creative accounting, until at last it became impossible to keep up the pretence.<br />\n<br />\nUltimately the company could not even be restructured and had to be liquidated. Thousands of Enron employees lost not only their jobs, but also their savings and pensions, which were tied up in company stock.<br />\n<br />\nRemarkably, bribed KOSHER US judges found that Enrons criminal auditors could not be held legally responsible for what was clearly criminal negligence and dereliction of duty over a prolonged period.<br />\n<br />\nInstead, the only charge that could be brought against it was obstruction of justice, for shredding documents relating to its audit of Enron. And even that was overturned by the Supreme Court in 2005, on grounds of flaws in the instructions to the jury! However, because the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission did not allow it to audit public companies, the company could not retain viable business and eventually collapsed.<br />\n<br />\nEnron CEO Rebecca Mark came to India regularly in MINI SKIRT and flashed her hairy blonde pussy at India Maratha manoos politicians to soften them up and prevent them from driving a hard bargain...<br />\n<br />\nread all 33 parts of the post below--<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/shell-companies-for-money-laundering.html<br />\n<br />\nAND MIND YOU , OUR CJI, JS KHEHAR WANTED FOREIGN JEW LAWYER FIRMS IN INDIA...<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.news18.com/news/india/open-indian-legal-sector-to-foreign-players-says-cji-js-khehar-1455525.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_218BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; Doing something good to others without expectations is\ncharity. It is a selfless fuckin\u2019 act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples?--Non Profit\nOrganization in India caring for disadvantaged elderly senior citizens--or\nrestore children\u2019s rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trust, Society and\nSection 8 Company can seek registration u/s 12A to claim exemption under\nprovisions of Income Tax Act\u20191961, if certain conditions are satisfied. Section\n12A deals with registration of trust and section 12AA deals with procedure for\nregistration of trust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Notwithstanding the\nfact that trust, society and section 8 companies are registered as per their\nrespective acts, the registration under section 12A is necessary to claim\nexemption under Income Tax Act<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the registration\nis granted to the trust, it will be hold good till the cancellation of\nregistration. There is no provision which requires any renewal of registration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Audit is also\nprerequisite for claiming exemption under section 11 and 12\u2014 but there is a\nMAFIA helping out through loopholes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs WHO\nSELL HARVESTED INDIAN KIDNEYS TO KOSHER FOREIGN FORCES ARE NOW THE GOOD\nSAMARITANS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONCE A SHIPBOARD\nOFFICER OF MINE ( HE IS A TOP RANKING SHIPPING GOVT OFFICER ) ASKED ME TO\nDONATE TO HIS NGO FOR RETARDED CHILDREN.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE SAID THE DONATION\nWILL BE TAX FREE. I HAD FOUND OUT THAT HIS OWN SON IS A RETARD AND HENCE\nPRETENDED IGNORANCE \u2026 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I DONATED A GOOD AMOUNT\n, BECAUSE HE WAS A GOOD OFFICER ( ORIYA GUY ) WHEN HE SAILED UNDER ME. LATER\nTHE BANK MANAGER KEPT INSISTING THAT I MUST GET TAX BENEFIT FOR THE CHEQUE.. I\nJUST TOLD HIM\u2014YEAH\u2014LATER ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILDS ( LYNNE AND\nEVELYN ) CAME TO INDIA TO START THEIR OWN NGOs AND THEY DONATED THEIR LAREGE\nPORTAITS TO BE HUNG IN THE NGO OFFICES..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminal businessmen\nand evil politicians who take bribes ( quid pro quo ) set up Trusts to launder\ntheir own un-taxed funds. By setting up a Trust and passing their own funds to\nit (usually after passing it through the accounts of others and in their\nnames), builders, politicians ( shell companies ) and other unscrupulous\nindividuals\u2014they legitimize their black money\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Subsequently, these\nfunds are diverted for the benefit of the Trustees or whoever is the real\nperson behind the trust. With the sheer number of NGOs in India, it is\ndifficult to monitor effectively whether they are actually applying their\nincome to the purposes for which they have been set up, as mentioned in the\nfirst point above. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Further, salaries to\nemployees and other running expenses can also be easily inflated and diverted.\nEvery once in a while we hear about NGOs where the supposed beneficiaries\n(children, elderly or animals) are ill-treated while the premises of the NGO is\nbeing used as a personal residence by the staff or Trustees and trust funds are\nused to purchase expensive cars and computers\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the most egregious\nmisuse of the exemptions available is in the way certain NGOs issues receipts\nto donors purely to allow them to evade taxes. These unscrupulous NGOs issue\nreceipts for much higher amounts than actually received to one person, allowing\nhim or her to claim a large deduction u/s 80G, and then make up the difference\nby taking the money from their actual sponsor, who is only to happy to convert\nhis black money into white by passing it into the Trust\u2019s account under another\nname\u2026<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Operating a commercial\nenterprise and disguising it as an NGO. Many schools and hospitals are run\nalong strictly commercial lines, charging high fees and making a tidy profit.\nHowever they are being constituted as Trusts so as to avoid taxation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think about every time\na school takes a \u2018donation\u2019 over and above the fees. This is a donation to a\nTrust\u2019s corpus fund, but is tax-exempt. Similar examples would abound.\nSimilarly, many religious places of worship make a lot of money from selling\nreligious literature, idols, incense-sticks, food and so on, without paying a\npaisa of tax on the profit by taking advantage of the loopholes in tax law\nsurrounding NGOs\u2026.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Board of Control for\nCricket in India (BCCI was formed in December 1928 by Jew Rothschild as a\nsociety, registered under the Tamil Nadu Societies Registration Act. The BCCI\nlogo is derived from the emblem of Rothschild-- the Order of the Star of India.\nBCCI does not depend on the Government of India for its finances. SAB MIL\nBHAANTKE KHAATE HAIN \u2013 WE ALL KNOW !...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BCCI had avoided taxes\non its income, claiming exemption as a charitable organisation. Although the\nIncome Tax Department withdrew this exemption in 2007-08, BCCI only paid PEANUT\ntaxes.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--maybe MR THIN UPPER\nLIP CAN THROW MORE LIGHT ON THIS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A PRIVATE NGO BCCI\nRULES OVER CRICKET LIKE AN EMPEROR. BCCI CAN SNUFF OUR CAREERS IN THE BLINK OF\nAN EYE . SACHIN TENDULKAR HELD ON LIKE A LIMPET FOR THREE FULL YEARS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/travesty-of-justice-sreesanth-and.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Delete<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt.
