text-decoration: none;\">March 29, 2017 at 8:43 PM</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_15MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">THANK GOD FOR THE JOINT LETTERS BY DESH DROHI AND FOREIGN PAYROLL INDIAN ACTIVISTS</span></b></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b></b></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MOST NAMES ARE COMMON TO ALL SUCH LETTERS ( INCLUDING SAME SEX MARRIAGE )&nbsp;</span></b></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span></b><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">WE ASK MODI GOT TO PROFILE THESE ACTIVISTS WHO ARE CONTROLLED FROM ABROAD-- &nbsp;MOST RUN SHELL COMPANIES</span></span></b></span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></b></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">\n</span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://newsnow.live/uphold-spirit-of-constitution-citizens-write-to-hamid-ansari/</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: x-large;\">I KNOW THE LIST OF FOREIGN FUNDED AND CONTROLLED ACTIVISTS WHO OPERATE SHELL COMPANIES&nbsp;</b></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TnBS4sYUU1Y/WNvQWLQ7NOI/AAAAAAABR74/kF0UgQD-V3g1AMtgauCkZBOnAjKeL88eQCLcB/s1600/dEEEownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"420\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-TnBS4sYUU1Y/WNvQWLQ7NOI/AAAAAAABR74/kF0UgQD-V3g1AMtgauCkZBOnAjKeL88eQCLcB/s640/dEEEownload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Technological advances\nin e-commerce, the global diversification of financial markets and new\nfinancial product developments provide opportunities to launder illegal profit\nand obscure the money trail leading back to the underlying crime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FINTRAC's financial\nintelligence plays a critical role in helping to combat money laundering. This\nfinancial intelligence is used to assist money laundering and terrorist\nfinancing investigations in the context of a wider variety of criminal\ninvestigations, where the origins of the suspected criminal proceeds are linked\nto drug trafficking, fraud, tax evasion, corruption, and other criminal\noffences. With these types of crimes, there are victims, there is often\nviolence, and there is real social harm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Financial Transactions\nand Reports Analysis Centre of Canada (FINTRAC) gathers, analyzes, assesses,\nand discloses financial intelligence. Originally created in July 2000 to\ncounter suspected money laundering,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FINTRAC receives\ninformation on:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suspicious transactions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suspected terrorist\nproperty<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large cash transactions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electronic funds\ntransfer<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cross border currency\nreporting<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suspicious transactions\nare&nbsp; reported by financial entities\n(banks and financial dealers), money services businesses, life insurance\ncompanies and agents, certain government agencies that take deposits (such as\nCanada Post), accountants or accounting firms, real estate agents and brokers,\nand casinos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">List of reports filed\nto FINTRAC:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suspicious transaction\nreports<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large cash transaction\nreports<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electronic funds\ntransfer reports<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Casino disbursement\nreports<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.thestar.com/news/canada/2016/12/22/canadian-bank-failed-to-report-1200-suspicious-transactions-documents-show.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.thestar.com/news/canada/2016/12/22/canadian-bank-failed-to-report-1200-suspicious-transactions-documents-show.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>JUST FINING IS NO\nDETERRENCE.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>CRIMINAL BANK MANAGERS&nbsp; MUST BE JAILED .. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WE ASK MODI NOT TO\nPROMOTE ANYBODY TO BANK MANAGER ANK UNLESS HE/ SHE PASSES AN EXAM .&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EXISTING MANAGERS MUST\nUNDERGO A TWO WEEK&nbsp; COURSE WITH AN EXAM\nAT THE END.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>I ASK \u2013 &nbsp; WHY DOES IT TAKE\nA BLOGGER TO WRITE ALL THIS SHIT ! &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AS YOU CAN SEE INDIAs NO 1 BEEF EXPORTER KAPIL SIBALs ASS IS ON FIRE !<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.fintrac-canafe.gc.ca/publications/guide/guide-eng.asp\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://www.fintrac-canafe.gc.ca/publications/guide/guide-eng.asp</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.fintrac.gc.ca/intro-eng.asp\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://www.fintrac.gc.ca/intro-eng.asp</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POEM is an\ninternationally recognised test to determine residence of a company\nincorporated in a foreign jurisdiction. It works to check companies who set up\nshell subsidiaries abroad to evade taxes. POEM is effective from 1 April 2016\nand accordingly shall apply from assessment year 2017-18 onwards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why is POEM important? In\nshort, because if a company\u2019s place of effective management is India, it will\nbe treated as a local resident and its global income will be taxable in the\ncountry. POEM is one of three criteria of corporate residency that are widely\nidentified under several jurisdictions. Place of a company\u2019s incorporation\n(POI) and place of its central control and management (CCM) are the other two.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Almost all\njurisdictions that impose tax on corporate entities determine the tax residence\nof such entities based on one of two types of tests or a combination thereof.\nThe first type is formal and usually based on POI of the company. Under the POI\ntest, for purposes of tax, a corporate entity is resident in the jurisdiction\nof its incorporation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second type, CCM, and POEM are substantive and based\non the \u2018real seat\u2019 of the corporation. POM determines whether a company is\nresident in a particular country. POEM is a tiebreaker test whose purpose is to\nresolve cases of dual residence by determining in which of the two states it is\nto be found.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POEM is concerned with\nwhat happens in both states since its purpose is to resolve dual residence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"https://www.bloombergquint.com/union-budget-india/2017/01/24/tax-department-issues-place-of-effective-management-rules-to-stop-evasion-by-foreign-companies\">https://www.bloombergquint.com/union-budget-india/2017/01/24/tax-department-issues-place-of-effective-management-rules-to-stop-evasion-by-foreign-companies</a></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Placing\n\"dirty\" money in a service company, where it is layered with\nlegitimate income and then integrated into the flow of money, is a common form\nof money laundering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money obtained from\ncertain crimes, such as extortion, insider trading, drug trafficking, and\nillegal gambling is \"dirty\". It needs to be cleaned to appear to have\nbeen derived from legal activities so that banks and other financial\ninstitutions will deal with it without suspicion. Money can be laundered by\nmany methods, which vary in complexity and sophistication.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, --money\nlaundering involves three steps: the first involves introducing cash into the\nfinancial system by some means (\"placement\"); the second involves\ncarrying out complex financial transactions to camouflage the illegal source of\nthe cash (\"layering\"); and finally, acquiring wealth generated from\nthe transactions of the illicit funds (\"integration\").&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of these\nsteps may be omitted, depending on the circumstances. For example, non-cash\nproceeds that are already in the financial system would not need to be placed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;First, the illegitimate funds are furtively\nintroduced into the legitimate financial system. Then, the money is moved\naround to create confusion, sometimes by wiring or transferring through\nnumerous accounts. Finally, it is integrated into the financial system through\nadditional transactions until the \"dirty money\" appears\n\"clean.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cash-intensive\nbusinesses: In this method, a business typically expected to receive a large\nproportion of its revenue as cash uses its accounts to deposit criminally\nderived cash. Such enterprises often operate openly and in doing so generate\ncash revenue from incidental legitimate business in addition to the illicit\ncash \u2013 in such cases the business will usually claim all cash received as legitimate\nearnings.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Service businesses are best suited to this method, as such businesses\nhave little or no variable costs and/or a large ratio between revenue and\nvariable costs, which makes it difficult to detect discrepancies between\nrevenues and costs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples are parking buildings, strip clubs, tanning beds,\ncar washes ( used in BREAKING BAD ) , and casinos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trade-based laundering:\nThis involves under or overvaluing invoices to disguise the movement of money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shell companies and\ntrusts: Trusts and shell companies disguise the true owner of money. Trusts and\ncorporate vehicles, depending on the jurisdiction, need not disclose their\ntrue, beneficial, owner. Sometimes referred to by the slang term rathole though\nthat term usually refers to a person acting as the fictitious owner rather a\nbusiness entity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bank capture: In this\ncase, money launderers or criminals buy a controlling interest in a bank,\npreferably in a jurisdiction with weak money laundering controls, and then move\nmoney through the bank without scrutiny. In recent years, banks and customers\nhave used electronic images of checks to process payments instead of paper\nchecks in an procedure known as remote deposit capture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The technology allows a\ncheck-cashing business in a foreign country to scan a bundle of checks and\ndeposit them at a U.S. bank. The entire process can take just seconds and\navoids the hassle of transporting physical checks overseas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But regulators are\nconcerned that electronic check processing could be exploited by money\nlaunderers. Drug cartels, for example, could turn to exchange houses in Mexico\nto scan images of travelers checks or money orders.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2010, Wachovia,\nwhich Wells Fargo bought in 2008, agreed to pay $160 million as part of a\nmoney-laundering investigation. The Justice Department said some $40 billion\nmoved through the bank from foreign correspondent accounts using remote deposit\ncapture. The deposits, made between 2005 and 2007, included travelers checks\nand money orders and were not monitored for money laundering..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Real estate: Someone\npurchases real estate with illegal proceeds and then sells the property. To\noutsiders, the proceeds from the sale look like legitimate income.\nAlternatively, the price of the property is manipulated: the seller agrees to a\ncontract that underrepresents the value of the property, and receives criminal\nproceeds to make up the difference.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Black salaries: A\ncompany may have unregistered employees without a written contract and pay them\ncash salaries. Dirty money might be used to pay them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tax amnesties: For\nexample, those that legalize unreported assets in tax havens and cash</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In theory, electronic\nmoney should provide as easy a method of transferring value without revealing\nidentity as untracked banknotes, especially wire transfers involving\nanonymity-protecting numbered bank accounts. In practice, however, the\nrecord-keeping capabilities of Internet service providers and other network\nresource maintainers tend to frustrate that intention.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cryptocurrencies under\nrecent development have aimed to provide for more possibility of transaction\nanonymity for various reasons <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, most financial\ninstitutions globally, and many non-financial institutions, are required to\nidentify and report transactions of a suspicious nature to the financial\nintelligence unit in the respective country. For example, a bank must verify a\ncustomer's identity and, if necessary, monitor transactions for suspicious\nactivity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is often termed as \"know your customer\". This means\nknowing the identity of the customer and understanding the kinds of\ntransactions in which the customer is likely to engage. By knowing one's\ncustomers, financial institutions can often identify unusual or suspicious\nbehaviour, termed anomalies, which may be an indication of money laundering.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bank employees, such as\ntellers and customer account representatives, are trained in anti-money\nlaundering and are instructed to report activities that they deem suspicious.\nAdditionally, anti-money laundering software filters customer data, classifies\nit according to level of suspicion, and inspects it for anomalies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such\nanomalies include any sudden and substantial increase in funds, a large\nwithdrawal, or moving money to a bank secrecy jurisdiction. Smaller transactions\nthat meet certain criteria may also be flagged as suspicious..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nsoftware&nbsp; flags names on government\n\"blacklists\" and transactions that involve countries hostile to the\nhost nation. Once the software has mined data and flagged suspect transactions,\nit alerts bank management, who must then determine whether to file a report\nwith the government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1989 Financial Action\nTask Force on Money Laundering (FATF) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FATF's three primary\nfunctions with regard to money laundering are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Monitoring members\u2019\nprogress in implementing anti-money laundering measures,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reviewing and reporting\non laundering trends, techniques, and countermeasures, and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Promoting the adoption\nand implementation of FATF anti-money laundering standards globally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United Nations\nOffice on Drugs and Crime maintains the International Money Laundering\nInformation Network, a website that provides information and software for\nanti-money laundering data collection and analysis. The World Bank has a\nwebsite that provides policy advice and best practices to governments and the\nprivate sector on anti-money laundering issues<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Money laundering\noffences have similar characteristics globally. There are two key elements to a\nmoney laundering offence:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The necessary act of\nlaundering itself i.e. the provision of financial services; and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A requisite degree of\nknowledge or suspicion (either subjective or objective) relating to the source\nof the funds or the conduct of a client.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The objective of the\ncriminalisation of money laundering is to take the profit out of crime. The\nrationale for the creation of the offence is that it is wrong for individuals\nand organisations to assist criminals to benefit from the proceeds of their criminal\nactivity or to facilitate the commission of such crimes by providing financial\nservices to them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While terrorists are\nnot greatly concerned with disguising the origin of money, they are concerned\nwith concealing its destination and the purpose for which it has been\ncollected. Terrorists and terrorist organizations therefore employ techniques\nsimilar to those used by money launderers to hide their money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ability to prevent\nand detect money-laundering is a highly effective means of identifying criminals\nand terrorists and the underlying activity from which money is derived. The\napplication of intelligence and investigative techniques can be one way of\ndetecting and disrupting the activities of terrorists and terrorist\norganizations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A GOOD FINANCIAL FRAUD\nEXPERT CAN DO BETTER THAN A SPY AGENT.. &nbsp; &nbsp;IN INDIA CRIMINALS&nbsp; BORROWED MONEY FROM INDIAN BANKS TO FUND LTTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A financial institution\nfound to have assisted in laundering money will be shunned by legitimate\nenterprises. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">US PRESIDENT BARACK\nOBAMAs MOTHER JEWESS ANN DUNHAM WAS A MIDDLEMAN FOR THIS CRIMIINAL BANK BELOW\u2014\nWHILE PRETENDING TO BE WORKING FOR ADB<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bank_of_Credit_and_Commerce_International\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bank_of_Credit_and_Commerce_International</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An international\nfinancial centre that is used for money-laundering can become an ideal\nfinancial haven. Developing countries that attract \"dirty money\" as a\nshort-term engine of growth can find it difficult, as a consequence, to attract\nthe kind of solid long-term foreign direct investment that is based on stable\nconditions and good governance, and that can help them sustain development and\npromote long-term growth.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Money-laundering can erode a nation's economy by\nchanging the demand for cash, making interest and exchange rates more volatile,\nand by causing high inflation in countries where criminals are doing business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most disturbing of all,\nmoney-laundering fuels corruption and organized crime. Corrupt public officials\nneed to be able to launder bribes, kick-backs, public funds and, on occasion,\neven development loans from international financial institutions.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Organized\ncriminal groups need to be able to launder the proceeds of drug trafficking and\ncommodity smuggling. Terrorist groups use money-laundering channels to get cash\nto buy arms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The social consequences of allowing these groups to launder money\ncan be disastrous. Taking the proceeds of crimes from corrupt public officials,\ntraffickers and organized crime groups is one of the best ways to stop\ncriminals in their tracks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In recent years, the\ninternational community has become more aware of the dangers that\nmoney-laundering poses in all these areas and many Governments and\njurisdictions have committed themselves to taking action. The United Nations\nand other international organizations are committed to helping them in any way\nthey can.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criminals are now\ntaking advantage of the globalization of the world economy by transferring\nfunds quickly across international borders. Money laundering is the process\nused to disguise the source of money or assets derived from criminal activity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Profit-motivated crimes span a variety of illegal activities from drug\ntrafficking and smuggling to fraud, extortion and corruption. The scope of\ncriminal proceeds is significant - estimated at more than 2.3 trillion\nworldwide each year.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The process of\nlaundering money may occur in a variety of ways, such as with the shrewd\nexploitation of a complex, interweaving web of secrecy jurisdictions and/or tax\nhavens, the manipulation of the concept of legal persons and legal arrangements\nto concoct \u2018shell companies\u2019 that can operate as covers for corrupt\nindividuals---</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--- the abuse of loopholes in existing anti-money laundering legislation,\nthe weak implementation of these rules, the corruption of authorities; all\ncombined with the profiteer culture of numerous established financial\ninstitutions and market insiders in developed economies .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tax evasion\nundermines the efforts of the government to promote welfare and social\ncohesion; it prevents it from performing its social function. Moreover, it\nerodes the credibility of democratic institutions, while injuring the trust of\ncitizens in the means and ends of a legitimate, democratic government. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those who are in a\nbetter position to avoid taxation are the people who can siphon their income\ninto foreign banks or jurisdictions, which usually means that they are\nbetter-off.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In avoiding their duties and responsibility vis-\u00e1-vis society and\nthe state, the tax evaders are in effect placing a greater burden on those who\neventually pay off the effective costs of taxation, who are in their majority,\nmembers of the lower and middle parts of the income distribution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As such tax\nevasion fosters or widens social inequality while it produces a de facto\ndivision of citizens between privileged and non-privileged. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS A REASON WHY WE\nWANT THE GOVT TO GO AFTER INDIANS WHO OPERATE SHELL COMPANIES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tax evasion provides\nincentives to established financial institutions as well as authorities or\npoliticians to engage in corrupt activities, in quest of their own enrichment\nor other benefit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Financial\ninstitutions/banks are interested in increasing their profits by making use of\nthis stream of funds, even if that implies circumventing the existing\nrules&nbsp; Authorities may be enticed to turn\na blind eye in this process, so that their own position in power may be\nconsolidated. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low corporate tax\nrates, a rather minimal corporate tax base and lax supervision in relation to\nestablishing holding companies, are strong incentives for corporations willing\nto avoid taxation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strengthen the requirements on the function of\ncorporate directors.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Directors should be held accountable for failing to take\nreasonable steps to prevent money laundering, this should apply regardless of\nwhether they are nominees or not.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Information of this sort should, for issues\nof transparency and democratic legitimacy be made publicly available to\ncitizens, so that an additional layer of social scrutiny may be placed over\ncorporations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Reconsider and reinforce the rules regarding\nthe due diligence that corporate registries and financial institutions should\nperform, always on an accurate risk-based approach, in an attempt to verify\nthat all information pertaining to the beneficial ownership is correct and that\nno margin for fraudulent or corrupt activity is allowed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Private entities such as banks must be\nexpected to comply with comprehensive rules on this issue, so that they are\nfully convinced that they know whom they are dealing with and whether their\nwealth is of a licit or illicit origin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">ALMOST ALL FOREIGN\nFUNDED NGOs IN INDIA OPERATE SHELL COMPANIES</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://www.financialexpress.com/india-news/zakir-naik-got-rs-60-cr-in-foreign-funds-floated-4-shell-firms/345131/\">http://www.financialexpress.com/india-news/zakir-naik-got-rs-60-cr-in-foreign-funds-floated-4-shell-firms/345131/</a></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large corporations\nsometimes use shell companies to hold assets temporarily during complex mergers\nand acquisitions. But these vehicles are also used to hide the provenance of\noffshore money held by those looking to evade taxes owed in their home\ncountries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This can be done by, for instance, placing bank accounts in the name\nof \"legal owners\"\u2014companies, trusts, foundations or combinations of\nthese\u2014rather than natural persons.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Further down the moral scale, shell\ncompanies are popular vehicles for moving and concealing public wealth stolen\nby officials and politicians (or bribes paid to them), as well as for\nsanctions-busting, drug-trafficking, arms-dealing and the financing of\nterrorism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many companies list\nnames and phone numbers for its executives, staff, or board of directors on\ntheir website or in official documents, because they want customers to see the\ncompany as open and accountable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the people running a phantom firm don\u2019t\nwant to be found and instead operate in the shadows\u2014they don\u2019t have websites\nand create as short of a paper trail as possible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Companies can list\n\u201cnominee\u201d shareholders or board members with no visible relation to the actual\nowner\u2014for instance, a lawyer or a distant relative, or people that can be hired\nspecifically to allow their names to fill in the blanks on these forms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\ncan also list other anonymous companies or trusts in order to make it more\ndifficult to track down the actual owner. The true owners or people in control\nof the company are often known to no one in the outside world other\nthan\u2014possibly\u2014a law firm or incorporation agent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once created, anonymous\nshell companies do little or no actual business. Instead, they often exist and\nfunction entirely on paper, opening bank accounts and owning assets without\never revealing the name of the true person benefiting from its conduct, whether\nlicit or illicit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All companies should be\nrequired to disclose their ultimate, human, beneficial owner(s) when they are\ncreated, and this information should be listed in a central registry. Ideally,\nthese registries should be freely available to the public, rather than just to\nlaw enforcement so that everyone has the ability to know with whom they are\ndoing business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE BENAMI MEDIA OF\nINDIA RECEIVES FOREIGN FUNDS VIA SHELL COMPANIES</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://satyavijayi.com/ndtv-director-exposes-made-shell-companies-launder-money/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://satyavijayi.com/ndtv-director-exposes-made-shell-companies-launder-money/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is alleged that a shell company of\nNDTV received a three hundred and seventy-five crore rupee loan from a bank at\nan interest rate of 19%, and within two days 92 crore rupees were diverted to Prannoy\nJames Roy and his wife as interest free loans.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://indiaarising.com/ndtvs-biggest-scam-prannoy-roy-wife-granted-92-crore-interest-free-loan/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://indiaarising.com/ndtvs-biggest-scam-prannoy-roy-wife-granted-92-crore-interest-free-loan/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is also alleged that\nthe income tax commissioner who discovered this was hounded with the help of\nformer finance minister Chidambaram, and that one of the Enforcement\nDirectorate\u2019s money trails in the 2G spectrum scam leads to NDTV\u2019s doorstep<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://vsktelangana.org/ndtv-frauds-string-of-laundering/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://vsktelangana.org/ndtv-frauds-string-of-laundering/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NDTV , the most hated\nmedia in India filed a petition before the National Green Tribunal to stop the\nSagarmala project.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This may merit a full post.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This mega project consisted of\nhundred and fifty major projects along India\u2019s coastline, which when they\nmaterialized, would save the country an estimated thirty-five thousand crores\nin logistics while boosting exports by an estimated hundred ten billion dollars\nand creating an around one crore new jobs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is rather strange for a media\noutlet, with no expertise in any of the necessary fields, to indulge in such\nacts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://organiser.org/Encyc/2017/3/20/NDTV-Frauds---String-of-Laundering.aspx\">http://organiser.org/Encyc/2017/3/20/NDTV-Frauds---String-of-Laundering.aspx</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.pgurus.com/prannoy-roy-his-henchman-at-ndtv-more-lies-fraud/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.pgurus.com/prannoy-roy-his-henchman-at-ndtv-more-lies-fraud/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://pcwedsndtv.blogspot.in/\">http://pcwedsndtv.blogspot.in/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tHN4H4nokwE/WNwjKFgDAzI/AAAAAAABR8M/HQp6XPfpDW0iyavRHe5gXjyN8-wzKiaiQCLcB/s1600/1-1badb0a1s86.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://postcard.news/subramanian-swamy-demands-cbi-ed-probe-ndtv-prannoy-roy-barkha-dutt-sonia-singh-vikram-chandra-money-laundering-case/\">http://postcard.news/subramanian-swamy-demands-cbi-ed-probe-ndtv-prannoy-roy-barkha-dutt-sonia-singh-vikram-chandra-money-laundering-case/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">YES--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">DESH DROHIS WHO OPERATE SHELL COMPANIES TO RECEIVE FOREIGN FUNDS FOR ANTI-WATAN ACTIVITIES -- WILL SOON GET THEIR DUE</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THE NOOSE IS AWAITING !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Statement on the \u201cIllegitimate and Inappropriate\nUsage of&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">the Provisions Related with Money Bills and\nFinance Bills by&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">the Government\u201d</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">More than 200 concerned citizens have\nexpressed concern on the classification of the Finance Bill,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">2017 as a \"Money Bill\" and appealed\nto Vice Predient Hamid Ansari. The statement is reproduced&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">below:</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">March 29, 2017<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Dear Honourable Chairperson of the Rajya\nSabha,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As concerned citizens of India, we are\nappalled and dismayed at the Government\u2019s use of money&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">bills to push through important legislation\nthat affects all citizens, without requiring approval by both&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">houses of Parliament.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This undemocratic strategy has already been\nemployed in the case of the Aadhaar Bill, even though&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">it contains many provisions that go well\nbeyond issues relating to taxation and money appropriations&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">of the government, which will directly affect\nevery citizen of the country in numerous ways. Despite&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">the fact the millions of citizens will be\ndenied their rights because of this, the Bill makes access to</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">many essential and other public services contingent\non Aadhaar. It is already evident that making it&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">compulsory in food distribution in some\nstates has excluded many needy and deserving citizens&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">without cause. The Bill allows for\nunprecedented surveillance of every citizen and massive invasion&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">of privacy. These can be used by governments\nat different levels to target political opponents and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">dissidents, as well as others. Because it\nenables data sharing even by private companies, it renders&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">all citizens vulnerable to identity theft,\nfraud, cyber-piracy, data breaches and other uses of their&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">personal data with very serious security\nimplications. Furthermore, the protections and cybersecurity&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">provisions in the Bill are inadequate and do\nnot meet the standards prevalent in most&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">countries. Despite all these concerns, the\nBill will not even be debated in the Rajya Sabha and has&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">not been subject to adequate public scrutiny.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The most recent and alarming case of passing\nimportant and far reaching laws in the guise of money&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">bills is the inclusion in the Finance Bill\n2017 of some very important features that actually have no&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">place in such a Bill and deserve to be\nindependently discussed and debated. The Bill contains several&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">provisions that will drastically increase\n\u201cblack money\u201d and corruption. An important provision would&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">enable political parties to receive unlimited\nand anonymous funding from corporate entities and from&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">abroad, and will make electoral bonds\nanonymous. Since it is well known that political funding is&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">ISSN (Online) - 2349-8846</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">probably the most important source of\ncorruption in the country making it more opaque flies in the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">face of claims to greater transparency and\nwill make matters even worse than they are at present&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">with terrible implications for electoral\ndemocracy in the future. It is also in complete contrast to the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">treatment meted out to Non\u2013Governmental\nOrganisations and civil society groups fighting for&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">people\u2019s rights, who are not being allowed to\nreceive legitimate funds on dubious grounds.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">The&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Finance Bill 2017 also gives sweeping powers\nwithout accountability to the Income Tax department,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">which can encourage extortion at all levels.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Such bills, which have serious implications\nfor democratic functioning and financial security of all&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">citizens, require serious and extensive\npublic discussion and debate at all levels, with knowledge of&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">the full implications of all of their\nprovisions. Therefore, they cannot and should not be passed as&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">money bills. We, therefore, appeal to you to\nat the very least allow extensive and uninterrupted&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">discussions into every aspect of the Bill No.\n12-C of 2017 in the Upper House and put all these on</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">record and do everything else in your power\nto ensure that the practice of by\u2013passing important bills&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">by illegitimately classifying them as money\nbills is immediately stopped. We appeal to you to protect&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">the rights and duties of the Upper House and\nthe interests of all the people of India. These bills and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">the relevant provisions that cannot be\ndescribed as routine in any sense, must be subject to proper&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">democratic scrutiny in both houses of\nParliament.</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Signed by,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Aruna Roy</span>, Mazdoor Kisan Shakti Sangathan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Prabhat Patnaik</span>, Professor Emeritus, JNU, New\nDelhi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
