font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>INDIA\nIS IN THIS SORRY STATE BECAUSE OUR MAIN STREAM MEDIA DO NOT HAVE ANY LOYALTY TO\nTHE WATAN.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>EVEN AN\nILLITERATE &nbsp;HALFWIT BEGGAR ON THE STREET\nCAN DO THIS. <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>I ASK <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>OTHER\nTHAN CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL ( MERE BLOGGER ) , &nbsp;HOW MANY ECONOMISTS IN INDIA OR ABROAD TOLD\nTHAT DEMONETIZATION WONT HAVE ANY EFFECT IN INDIAN GDP GROWTH ? <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THIS\nIS AS STUPID AS ME HAVING TO CONVINCE RUSSIANS AFTER USSR BROKE UP- <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>( THEY\nWERE UPSET THAT THERE IS NO MILK IN THE MARKET ) &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>I HAD\nTO TELL THEM\u2014LISTEN, YOUR COWS ARE STILL WHERE THEY ARE , IN YOUR OWN COUNTRY .&nbsp; THEY HAVE NOT RUN AWAY TO ANOTHER COUNTRY\n..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THEY\nARE STILL GETTING MILKED\u2014ONLY THING IS YOU ARE NOT GETTING IT ON YOUR TABLE.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THEY\nINSTANTLY APPRECIATED MY CLEAR THINKING . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THINKING\nIS THE HARDEST THING TO DO, RIGHT ?<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wBrN4GuvI2E/WNzLr0GmX-I/AAAAAAABR8k/R9JdjFIwW4IGDDiQ3_e56a4bZ8Wiay9twCLcB/s1600/111011044845-ostfeld-viktor-bousst-horizontal-large-gallery.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wBrN4GuvI2E/WNzLr0GmX-I/AAAAAAABR8k/R9JdjFIwW4IGDDiQ3_e56a4bZ8Wiay9twCLcB/s640/111011044845-ostfeld-viktor-bousst-horizontal-large-gallery.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viktor Anatolyevich\nBout&nbsp; is a Tajik arms dealer. He used\nshell companies to supply arms all over the planet<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In&nbsp; 2011, he was convicted by a US federal court\nof conspiracy to kill U.S. citizens and officials, delivery of anti-aircraft\nmissiles, and providing aid to a terrorist organizations..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hollywood movie\nLord of War ( Nicholas Cage&nbsp; is based\non&nbsp; Bout's personal history and\nblack-market activities using hundreds of&nbsp;\nSHELL companies..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before his arrest in\nMarch 2008, Viktor Bout, shadowy international arms dealer and war profiteer,\nran a network of air cargo companies that specialize in transporting arms to\nconflict zones. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bout controlled the\nworld's largest private fleet of Antonov cargo planes with heavy airlift\ncapacity, capable of bringing tanks and other heavy arms into difficult\nterrain. He has fueled dozens of the world's most murderous conflicts by\nshipping arms clandestinely to rebel groups. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His field of operations\nincluded Afghanistan, Angola, Congo, Liberia, Pakistan, the Philippines,\nRwanda, Sierra Leone, and Sudan. The US and UK reputedly have used Bout's\nservices to bring shipments into dangerous zones of Iraq.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bout\u2019s&nbsp; companies have conducted countless trips for\nthe United Nations ( for Jews to steal )&nbsp;\ninto the same areas where he supplied the arms that fueled the conflicts\nand humanitarian crises to begin with.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nHe has airlifted Belgian peacekeepers into Somalia, brought French\ntroops into Rwanda..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viktor Bout has been\nable to operate with impunity thanks to his many passports, different\nidentities, and the wide support he enjoys from those in power. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In March 2008, Bout was\narrested in Bangkok, while attempting to sell arms to US investigators posing\nas Colombian FARC rebels. The US government sought Bout\u2019s extradition on\ncharges of conspiring to sell weapons to a terrorist organization for use in\nkilling Americans.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For nearly two decades,\nas Bout grew infamous as the \"Merchant of Death\" \u2013 his unwanted\nnickname for the black-market weapons deals of which he was accused but long\ndenied \u2013 the world he inhabited remained murky to outsiders. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 70\ntranscripts compiled from wiretapped meetings and conversations and scores of\nphone calls and text messages depict everything from his preference for lemon\nin tea to his use of memory cards in cell phones to disguise the trail of his\nphone calls. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A U.S. official said\nthat Bout\u2019s seized computer also contained evidence that the Russian's business\nempire had set up hundreds of shell companies around the world for his air\ncargo and other business ventures, stretching from remote South Pacific islands\nto the state of Montana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the collapse of\nthe Soviet Union, Bout, a former Soviet military officer, made his fortune\nselling Soviet-era weaponry to Third World despots and insurgent groups. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bout dispatched fleets\nof Cold War-era Soviet cargo planes to some of the most inhospitable corners of\nthe earth, running guns for dictators, including Liberia's Charles Taylor and\nZaire's Mubuto Sese Seko, as well as rebel leaders in Angola, Sierra Leone and\nbeyond.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The indictment cites 15\naviation companies that Bout owned, including Air Cess, Irbis Air Company and\nSanta Cruz Imperial.. Bout's payments&nbsp;\nincluded diamonds. Bout also allegedly trafficked arms for the Taliban,\nand his aviation services were so vast that the Pentagon contracted one of his\ncompanies to deliver goods into Iraq from 2003 to 2005. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">See Pentagon deals only\nwith GOOD people and drop only GOOD BOMBS. U.S. government contractors paid\nBout-controlled firms roughly $60 million to fly supplies into Iraq in support\nof the U.S. war effort, according to a book about Bout called \"Merchant of\nDeath: Money, Guns, Plans, and the Man Who Makes War Possible.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bout supplied\narmor-piercing missiles to Hezbollah in the summer of 2006 and arms to Somali\nwarlords.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">Bout was able to do business largely thanks to a sprawling network of shell companies.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">Bout maintained absolute control over these accounts, but no links to Bout could be found.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>ARMS DEALERS CANNOT\nWORK WITHOUT SHELL COMPANIES <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">IN INDIA WE ARE STILL\nFRETTING AND &nbsp;SWEATING OVER THE PURULIA\nARMS DROP WHICH HAPPENED 22 YEARS AGO .. &nbsp; &nbsp;PATHETIC !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c576088335889284670\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-decoration: none;\">March 30, 2017 at 2:54 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_91MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHY IS THE MODI GOVT ALLOWING RAJYA SABHA MEMBERS TO AMEND FINANCE BILL ?<br />\n<br />\nDONT THEY KNOW RAJYA SABHA HAS NO POWERS ON FINANCE ?<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID THE RAJYA SABHA SPEAKER ALLOW DISCUSSIONS ON FINANCE BILL?<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">IF THE RAJYA SABHA SPEAKER DOES NOT KNOW THE RULES UNDER THE CONSTITUTION --WE THE PEOPLE DEMAND HIS EXPULSION .</span></b></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_91BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_33.html?showComment=1490865892543#c307694879556819549\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 30, 2017 at 2:54 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_90MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">POOR BASTARD MEDIA WHORES<br /><br />THEY DONT KNOW ASSHOLE FROM ELBOW !<br /><br />THEY ONLY KNOW BOLLYWOOD, CRICKET AND CHOOTIYA POLITICS</span></b></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_91b+seedGG8eD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_91b+seedGG8eD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8205074310351741029\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_96M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_33.html?showComment=1490867372703#c8205074310351741029\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 30, 2017 at 3:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_96MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.thequint.com/india/2017/03/30/farhat-naik-renowned-islamic-preacher-zakir-naik-better-half-islam-preacher<br />\n<br />\nMIYA AUR BIWEE -- BOTH RUN SHELL COMPANIES<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>WAAH RAAJAAA WAH&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even when the criminals\nbehind the shell companies get caught, the registered agents who help set them\nup are often left untouched -- and many continue to rake in money by\nregistering fronts for potentially dangerous criminals. shell companies pose a\nthreat to national security and make it nearly impossible to find the people\nwho are actually financing terrorism and other criminal activities.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The smartest criminals use shell companies in\nconjunction with their actual&nbsp; actual\nbusiness operations to further confuse authorities and create a false sense of\nlegitimacy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The family behind Peruvian drug trafficking ring Sanchez-Paredes,\nfor example, allegedly used a complicated combination of shell companies -- a\nfew of which were located in Florida -- and gold mines in Peru \"to layer\nand disguise the family's illegal cocaine proceeds for decades..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Luka Bojovic\n-- previously one of Serbia's most wanted criminals -- was reportedly involved\nwith the assassination of Serbia's prime minister, while Darko Saric was\ncharged by the Serbian government with trafficking more than 5,000 kilograms of\ncocaine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several of the shell\ncompanies allegedly used by these mobsters can be traced to the same registered\nagent: a Delaware firm named Harvard Business Services, which says on its\nwebsite that it will help form more than 10,000 companies this year alone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Harvard Business\nServices, has nothing to do with Harvard University<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In one of the more\ncreative schemes, the ruthless Los Zetas drug cartel used a horse ranch and a\nnumber of shell companies to conceal millions of dollars in drug money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here's how the money\nlaundering operation worked:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jose Trevino Morales,\nthe brother of two Los Zetas leaders -- one of whom reportedly dismembered his\nvictims while they were still alive -- owned a horse ranch in Oklahoma where he\nclaimed to be running a prosperous business of buying and selling race horses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in reality, most of\nthe deals he made had nothing to do with horses -- some of which were fittingly\nnamed \"Number One Cartel\" and \"Morning Cartel.\" In order to\ncover up and transfer illegal drug proceeds and make the money appear to be\n\"clean,\" he and his associates would funnel it through shell\ncompanies and front men under the guise of horse sales -- making sure the\ncartel leaders' names were nowhere to be found.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the end,\ninvestigators discovered that more than $22 million in drug money had been sent\nback to Mexico. Trevino was convicted of money laundering in 2013 and sentenced\nto 20 years in prison.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Investigative journalism is of paramount\nimportance in combating financial fraud&nbsp;\nregard, as it performs the function of not only revealing existing crime\nor mischief, but also of as a DETERRENT to possible future crime. The sources\nof investigative journalists should at all times be kept secret in order not to\njeopardise ongoing investigations and not to discourage future ones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive support of\ninvestigative journalism in these times of technological and economic\ntransition should be considered as an amiable end, especially in respect to its\ncrime- and corruption containing impact.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nIn addition, whistleblowers involved in the efforts to unearth graft\nandcorruption, incompetence of authorities and/or malpractices of private\nentities, should at all times enjoy all necessary protection and support.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anti-money laundering\nand tax havens---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As there are\nsubstantial similarities between the techniques used to launder the proceeds of\ncrime and to commit tax crimes, in May 1998 the G7 Finance Ministers encouraged\ninternational action to enhance the capacity of anti-money laundering systems\nto deal effectively with tax-related crimes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this respect the\nOECD's Committee on Fiscal Affairs has established a dialogue with the\nFinancial Action Task Force and continues to examine ways of improving\nco-operation between tax and anti-money laundering authorities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Joint workshops with\ntax and anti-money laundering officials have been held allowing experts to\nshare experiences on some of the practices that are common to both tax evasion\nand money laundering. OECD work on tax crime and money laundering is designed\nto complement what has already been carried out by FATF.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tax evasion and/or the\nunscrupulous misuse of legal loopholes in cross-border tax legislation further\nundermine the state's fiscal position, while it produces incentives for\nsocially-detrimental profiteering in times of an economic downturn, it\nincreases the chances for the corruption of officials and/or financial\ncorporatists willing to circumvent or disobey existing rules and prevailing\nprinciples, therefore initiating a vicious cycle of mischief and illegitimacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The invidious effects\nof tax-related crime are multi-faceted, ranging from criminality to corruption,\nto social injustice and asymmetric, distortive economic activity. To make\nmatters worse, such crimes also have a more profound and corrosive effect on\nthe institutional milieu of the polity, as they erode the trust and faith\ncitizens have in democratic institutions and in the capacity of a directly\nelected government to improve the life of its citizens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A potential terrorist\ncannot take a flight to neighboring states without a passport or driver\u2019s\nlicense, but they can form a shell company without any information in a matter\nof minutes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The life-blood of an\neffective terrorist network is financing. And shell companies facilitate the\neasy distribution of money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we want to fight\nterrorism effectively, we should also be cracking down on terrorism financing.\nGiven the ease and persistence of terrorist financing \u2013 particularly using\nshell companies \u2013 a shift in attention on financial regulations that would stop\nterrorism financing would be a good start.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The United States has\nimplemented a host of measures, including the use of \u201cterrorist designations\u201d\nand Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs), to root out and eliminate risks in our\nfinancial institutions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, none of these\nregulations have been enacted by Congress, (&nbsp;\nthanks to Jew Rothschild\u2019s clout ) and so they are not binding to U.S.\nstates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Investigators found\nthat&nbsp; some firms were more likely to\noffer their assistance when we posed as terrorists than when we posed as\nbusinesses from USA ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The common link among\nthese individuals in Panama papers&nbsp; is\nthat they used shell companies and offshore accounts to shield their wealth\nfrom their home governments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is grave concern\nabout fairness, international tax schemes and shell companies. A particular\nfocus of the current investigation is the widespread use (and abuse) of\nanonymous shell companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 32, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_30.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_30.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SyR5nBnzg8o/WNu5fmTOuqI/AAAAAAABR7o/5pzumgC_hewbfusz4XpyFnlQwhH8hk0RwCLcB/s1600/IMG_8872%2Bcopy.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SyR5nBnzg8o/WNu5fmTOuqI/AAAAAAABR7o/5pzumgC_hewbfusz4XpyFnlQwhH8hk0RwCLcB/s640/IMG_8872%2Bcopy.JPG\" width=\"258\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "123", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/8369750173559330246/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "2042174496748794790", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-03-29T00:47:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-03-29T19:16:39+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDkwNzk1MTk5MzYyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_29.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2042174496748794790", "title": "SHELL COMPANIES for money laundering, tax evasion, hiding kickbacks, layering PART 30 -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 29, BELOW---</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_28.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/shell-companies-for-money-laundering_28.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All inherent schemes\nhave two aspects: the entity structure and the fraudulent action. The first\nstep is building the fraud scenarios within the audit scope. The second is building\nthe audit response to the identified fraud scenarios.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud audit approach\ngenerally starts with the entity structure and then focuses on the action &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Component of the fraud scenario.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud scenarios\ninvolving vendors, customers, and employees tend to use a false entity\nstructure to commit the fraudulent activity. Within each category, there will be\npermutations that will affect the fraud auditing testing procedures. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most common false\nentities are:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The entity was\ncreated by the perpetrator, vendors, or customers. Vendors and customers are\neither legally created or exist in name only. When the entity exists in name\nonly, the entity verification procedures will detect the false entity. For\nlegally created entities, the fraud auditing testing procedure should link the\nincorporation date to first business date. As a guide, when the entity\nincorporation date is within 90 days of first business transaction date, that is\na red flag of a false entity or a favored entity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The perpetrator\nassumes the identity of a real entity such as a vendor, customer, or employee. &nbsp;Therefore, the address or telephone number\nwithin the company master file for the entity should not match the address or\ntelephone number of the entity verification procedures. A caveat exists in the\npassthrough fraud scheme where one of the perpetrators is employed at the real\nsource of the goods or services, so it is possible to obtain a match of records.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the entity is\ndetermined to be a real entity, there are generally three possible outcomes:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Favorite entity\nstatus indicates the entity is real, but there might be a real or perceived\nconflict. If there is a conflict, the fraud scenario would be dependent on the\nnature of the account, or else there is no fraud scenario occurring.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 The fraud scenario\nlinks to a real entity, whereby a decision tree would aid in the determination\nof the type of scenarios occurring.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 No fraud scenario is\noccurring. When the entity is established as a real entity, a decision tree can\ndirect the auditor to the inherent scheme structure for the applicable core\nbusiness system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From a fraud audit\nperspective, here are some shell company schemes used to commit internal embezzlement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 False Billing: The\npayment for goods or services not delivered or provided.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Pass Through: The\npayment for goods or services that are provided. In this scheme, a real vendor provides\ngoods or services to a shell company, which in turn provides the goods or\nservices to your organization with a markup on price (the only function the\nfront company provides is a pass through of the goods or services).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are\nthree variations caused by the employment location of the perpetrator. The\nscheme can be committed solely by an internal employee, an internal employee in\ncollusion with a sales person from the real supplier, or directed by a customer\ninvolving cost reimbursable contracts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud concealment\ninvolves the strategies used by the perpetrator of the fraud scenario to\nconceal the true intent of the transaction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Common concealment strategies are:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">false documents, false\nrepresentations, false approvals, avoiding or circumventing control levels,\ninternal control inhibitors, blocking the access to information, geographic distance\nbetween documents and controls, and both real and perceived pressure.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An\nimportant aspect of fraud concealment pertains to the level of sophistication\nused by the perpetrator.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inherent fraud schemes\naren\u2019t thought of in terms of complexity; rather, it is the level of\nsophistication used to conceal the fraud that is the focus for the fraud\nauditor. On its most simplistic level, without a concealment strategy, the\ninherent fraud scheme would be visible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second steep is\nbuilding the data profile for the fraud scenario.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud is a\nbillion-dollar business and it is increasing every year. The PwC global\neconomic crime survey suggests that more than 41% organizations experienced\neconomic crime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Traditional methods of\ndata analysis have long been used to detect fraud. They require complex and\ntime-consuming investigations that deal with different domains of knowledge\nlike financial, economics, business practices and law.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud often consists of\nmany instances or incidents involving repeated transgressions using the same\nmethod. Fraud instances can be similar in content and appearance but usually\nare not identical.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Internet transactions\nhave recently raised big concerns, with some research showing that internet\ntransaction fraud is 12 times higher than in-store fraud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud that involves\ncell phones, insurance claims, tax return claims, credit card transactions etc.\nrepresent significant problems for governments and businesses, but yet\ndetecting and preventing fraud is not a simple task.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud is an adaptive\ncrime, so it needs special methods of intelligent data analysis to detect and\nprevent it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Techniques used for\nfraud detection fall into two primary classes: statistical techniques and\nartificial intelligence.Examples of statistical data analysis techniques are:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Data preprocessing\ntechniques for detection, validation, error correction, and filling up of\nmissing or incorrect data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calculation of various\nstatistical parameters such as averages, quantiles, performance metrics,\nprobability distributions, and so on. For example, the averages may include\naverage length of call, average number of calls per month and average delays in\nbill payment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Models and probability\ndistributions of various business activities either in terms of various\nparameters or probability distributions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Computing user\nprofiles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time-series analysis of\ntime-dependent data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Clustering and\nclassification to find patterns and associations among groups of data.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matching algorithms to\ndetect anomalies in the behavior of transactions or users as compared to\npreviously known models and profiles. Techniques are also needed to eliminate\nfalse alarms, estimate risks, and predict future of current transactions or\nusers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some forensic\naccountants specialize in forensic analytics which is the procurement and analysis\nof electronic data to reconstruct, detect, or otherwise support a claim of\nfinancial fraud. The main steps in forensic analytics are (a) data collection,\n(b) data preparation, (c) data analysis, and (d) reporting.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example,\nforensic analytics may be used to review an employee's purchasing card activity\nto assess whether any of the purchases were diverted or divertible for personal\nuse.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Forensic analytics might be used to review the invoicing activity for a\nvendor to identify fictitious vendors, and these techniques might also be used\nby a franchisor to detect fraudulent or erroneous sales reports by the\nfranchisee in a franchising environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud management is a\nknowledge-intensive activity. The main AI techniques used for fraud management\ninclude:----<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Data mining to\nclassify, cluster, and segment the data and automatically find associations and\nrules in the data that may signify interesting patterns, including those\nrelated to fraud.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Expert systems to\nencode expertise for detecting fraud in the form of rules.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pattern recognition to\ndetect approximate classes, clusters, or patterns of suspicious behavior either\nautomatically (unsupervised) or to match given inputs.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Machine learning\ntechniques to automatically identify characteristics of fraud.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neural networks that\ncan learn suspicious patterns from samples and used later to detect them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other techniques such\nas link analysis, Bayesian networks, decision theory, land sequence matching\nare also used for fraud detection.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The machine learning\nand artificial intelligence solutions may be classified into two categories:\n'supervised' and 'unsupervised' learning. These methods seek for accounts,\ncustomers, suppliers, etc. that behave 'unusually' in order to output suspicion\nscores, rules or visual anomalies, depending on the method.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whether supervised or\nunsupervised methods are used, note that the output gives us only an indication\nof fraud likelihood. No stand alone statistical analysis can assure that a\nparticular object is a fraudulent one.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It can only indicate that this object is\nmore likely to be fraudulent than other objects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In supervised learning,\na random sub-sample of all records is taken and manually classified as either\n'fraudulent' or 'non-fraudulent'. Relatively rare events such as fraud may need\nto be over sampled to get a big enough sample size.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These manually classified records are then\nused to train a supervised machine learning algorithm. After building a model\nusing this training data, the algorithm should be able to classify new records\nas either fraudulent or non-fraudulent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Supervised neural\nnetworks, fuzzy neural nets, and combinations of neural nets and rules, have\nbeen extensively explored and used for detecting fraud in mobile phone networks\nand financial statement fraud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bayesian learning\nneural network is implemented for credit card fraud detection,\ntelecommunications fraud, auto claim fraud detection, and medical insurance\nfraud.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hybrid\nknowledge/statistical-based systems, where expert knowledge is integrated with\nstatistical power, use a series of data mining techniques for the purpose of\ndetecting cellular clone fraud. Specifically, a rule-learning program to\nuncover indicators of fraudulent behaviour from a large database of customer\ntransactions is implemented.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In banking, fraud can\ninvolve using stolen credit cards, forging checks, misleading accounting\npractices, etc.&nbsp; In insurance, 30% of\nclaims contain some form of fraud, resulting in approximately 13% of insurance\npayout dollars.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud can range from\nexaggerated losses to deliberately causing an accident for the payout.&nbsp; With all the different methods of fraud,\nfinding it becomes harder still.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Data mining and\nstatistics help to anticipate and quickly detect fraud and take immediate\naction to minimize costs. Through the use of sophisticated data mining tools,\nmillions of transactions can be searched to spot patterns and detect fraudulent\ntransactions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud concealment\nsophistication should be rated on both the perpetrator\u2019s ability to hide the\ntransaction and the auditor\u2019s ability to detect the transaction. To aid in the\ndetermination of a level of sophistication applicable to a concealment\nstrategy, a rating scale of low, medium, and high is used.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a correlation\nbetween fraud detection and the sophistication of the concealment strategy.\nWhen the perpetrator\u2019s concealment strategy is more sophisticated than the\naudit methodology, the fraud goes undetected. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, in addition to\naudit methodology, the auditor has the fraud detection tool of awareness. Fraud\nis revealed when the audit detection is as sophisticated as the concealment\nstrategy, thereby resulting in a directly proportional relationship <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fraud Audit Plan:\nDetection of Shell Companies The process of detecting shell corporations is a\ntwo-step process. The first step is the data mining, which is designed to\nlocate vendors that are consistent with the data profile of a shell corporation\nor transactions that are indicative of a shell corporation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second step is\nperforming audit procedures, which are designed to pierce the concealment\nstrategy or reveal the truth. The data mining strategy is a two-fold process.\nThe first step is to understand the impact the sophistication of the\nconcealment strategy has on the data mining process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using sophisticated data\nmining tools such as decision trees (Boosting trees, Classification trees,\nCHAID and Random Forests),&nbsp; machine\nlearning,&nbsp; association rules, cluster\nanalysis and neural networks , predictive models can be generated to estimate\nthings such as probability of fraudulent behavior or the dollar amount of\nfraud.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These predictive models help to\nfocus resources in the most efficient manner to prevent or recuperate fraud\nlosses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chi-square automatic\ninteraction detection (CHAID) is a decision tree technique, based on adjusted\nsignificance testing (Bonferroni testing). In statistics, the Holm\u2013Bonferroni\nmethod (also called the Holm method or Bonferroni-Holm method) is used to\ncounteract the problem of multiple comparisons. It is intended to control the\nfamilywise error rate and offers a simple test uniformly more powerful than the\nBonferroni correction. It is one of the earliest usages of stepwise algorithms\nin simultaneous inference.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHAID can be used for prediction (in a similar\nfashion to regression analysis, this version of CHAID being originally known as\nXAID) as well as classification, and for detection of interaction between\nvariables.. In practice, CHAID is often used in the context of direct marketing\nto select groups of consumers and predict how their responses to some variables\naffect other variables, although other early applications were in the field of\nmedical and psychiatric research.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like other decision\ntrees, CHAID's advantages are that its output is highly visual and easy to\ninterpret. Because it uses multiway splits by default, it needs rather large\nsample sizes to work effectively, since with small sample sizes the respondent\ngroups can quickly become too small for reliable analysis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One important advantage\nof CHAID over alternatives such as multiple regression is that it is\nnon-parametric.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Random forests or\nrandom decision forests are an ensemble learning method for classification,\nregression and other tasks, that operate by constructing a multitude of\ndecision trees at training time and outputting the class that is the mode of\nthe classes (classification) or mean prediction (regression) of the individual\ntrees. Random decision forests correct for decision trees' habit of overfitting\nto their training set.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decision tree learning\nuses a decision tree as a predictive model which maps observations about an\nitem (represented in the branches) to conclusions about the item's target value\n(represented in the leaves). It is one of the predictive modelling approaches\nused in statistics, data mining and machine learning.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tree models where the\ntarget variable can take a finite set of values are called classification\ntrees; in these tree structures, leaves represent class labels and branches\nrepresent conjunctions of features that lead to those class labels.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decision\ntrees where the target variable can take continuous values (typically real\nnumbers) are called regression trees. In decision analysis, a decision tree can\nbe used to visually and explicitly represent decisions and decision making. In\ndata mining, a decision tree describes data (but the resulting classification\ntree can be an input for decision making).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gradient boosting is a\nmachine learning technique for regression and classification problems, which\nproduces a prediction model in the form of an ensemble of weak prediction\nmodels, typically decision trees. It builds the model in a stage-wise fashion\nlike other boosting methods do, and it generalizes them by allowing\noptimization of an arbitrary differentiable loss function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red;\">OOPS , I MUST GET BACK\nTO THE </span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue;\">LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"> </span><span style=\"color: red;\">LEVEL.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">LEST I BECOME &nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">McWOLF</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n!</span></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">AIIYYYYOOOOOO !</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GmF2Z5-RmHQ/WNq_cOA3qTI/AAAAAAABR7I/8xkG5R_xDMc9l3g4Vy4lDxUQe5HdCSv6QCLcB/s1600/miEEghty-mcwolf-droopy-master-detective-2.09.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GmF2Z5-RmHQ/WNq_cOA3qTI/AAAAAAABR7I/8xkG5R_xDMc9l3g4Vy4lDxUQe5HdCSv6QCLcB/s320/miEEghty-mcwolf-droopy-master-detective-2.09.jpg\" width=\"280\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">FINANCIAL FRAUD &nbsp;COULD NEVER BE DETECTED IN INDIA BECAUSE WE HAD \"<span style=\"color: red;\">RAGADKE KHAINI MOONH MEIN DHAAL </span>\" INVESTIGATORS</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/a8xbtrLvFHc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/a8xbtrLvFHc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">DIGRESSION:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">One Goan Catholic Chief\nOfficer from Bandra was studying for his masters from home. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">He went for a walk\nalong the seashore at daybreak and found the BOMBAY FLOATING LIGHT ( a small\nship lighthouse painted red ) aground\u2014as the previous night there was a storm and\nthe floating light ship broke her moorings . <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
